additional_house_rules:
** Quiet hours between 23:00 to 09:00 - Please respect other tenants
Please be aware❗️
Israeli citizens will be charged an extra 17% TAX fees as law.
Please save your custom border entry ticket.
Please treat the space with respect.
If any problems arise, we will do our best to take action ASAP.

***There's a $200 fee per day booked for smoking in the property. There's a $100 fee per day booked per person above the number of guests you booked for. Locals MUST contact host BEFORE booking and ask permission to book the place. If the place is extra dirty, beyond the normally reasonable mess, beyond what a courteous guest would leave the home, there's an extra $140 fee, to cover extra costs for cleaning. That includes if the walls are dirty if the guests leave pots and pans in the kitchen sink if the floor is stained etc. If any portion of the House Rules is violated, it's grounds for immediate termination of the reservation without any refund. Only the person that made the reservation is allowed to check-in. You must have a valid working phone number before you book. If we try to contact you before check-in, we're allowed to cancel the reservation without granting any refund. If you have any undeclared guest, there'll be an additional charge of $100 per day booked per undeclared guest. If you have a complaint about any aspect of the property or of the hosts or host's personnel, and you tell us or Airbnb about it, you're authorizing us to get into the property to fix the issue, to solve the problem, or to repair the home or clean it to the standards that you require. We don't need extra authorization to enter the property if there's something you deem unsuitable, that needs remedy.
interaction: I am here for you!Feel free to contact me for any matter!I live just a couple of blocks away :)
transit: Part of the experience of the area you are in is the market that starts right under the building at the intersection of the streetsIn the market you will find:- Coffee shops- Authentic foods- Bars- Roof Top Club- Street performances on weekends- Graffiti art in the streets, and more!

description: BRAND NEW! really stylish and most importantly really QUITE space with all the amenities you may need. Located in the most perfect location, right on the corner where Jaffa meets the Noga Neighborhood, only a 5 min walk to the beaches, 10 min to the fun neighborhood of Florentine where you can find some of the best bars and night life and mere 10 min to the unique neighborhood of Neve Tzedek where you can find the old station as well an array of boutique shops and restaurants.The space*Double Bed*Sofa Bed*Fresh linen & towels*Nespresso machine*Coffee/Tea*55 inch Smart TV with NETFLIX & local channels* Full central AC & Heater Units*Hair dryer, Iron & Plug Adapters*Complimentary Toiletries*Super Fast fibre-optic Wifi*Fully equip kitchen*Dishwasher*Filtered cold Water*Washer & Dryer* 24h Self check inGuest accessThe apartment is 63sqm, has a open space lounge, a large bedroom and a bathroom. - The open space lounge has a fully equipped kitchen, spacious islands which acts a a dining table too and can fit up to 6, and a comfy sofa which turns into a double bed if needed, as well as a large 55inch smart tv.-The bedroom is fitted with a double size bed, a large hanging wardrobe and a full size mirror.- The bathroom includes a sink, toilet and a large walk in shower.Other things to noteDue to Covid 19 I would like to share some of the extra cleaning measures we are taking before check in to keep our guests safe and healthy: *All sheets, towels and rugs are washed in high temperatures (60°).*All surfaces, handles and buttons are cleaned with special anti bacteria spray.*Apt thoroughly aired out for a few hours. *cleaning team wear disposable masks and gloves at all times.*Hand sanitizer napkins supplied.

-אין לעשן בשום פנים ואופן בדירה.
- יש לשמור על הדירה ולהחזיר אותה כפי שקיבלתם אותה - בצורה נקיה ומכובדת. דירה שלא תוחזר במצב סביר יחוייב בדמי ניקיון נוסף.
- Smoking is strictly not allowed in any part of the apartment.
- If you are a  foreign national  please provide a picture of your passport photo page or of your b2 entry visa, so that we can refund you the 17 %  Israeli tax, exempt for non Israeli tourists.
transit: There is a bus stop right outside the apt from where you can find an array of bus lines connecting you to any part of the city you wish to go to.if you are coming by car, there is a paid parking lot right under our apt building, but if your ok walking a few minutes there is a cheaper option on 32 salame street.

reviews.comments: The property and host were both amazing! really spacious in modern. The kitchen, living room, and shower was soo nice! The location as well is just the best in Jaffa hands-down. We were able to go to the nearby market and restaurants/ bars and really enjoyed our stay, we will stay again for sure!
amazing experience, very clean and causy, and very close to everything in old Jaffa

reviews.comments: Eli is a fantastic host, great communication, great apartment, great location. Would definitely stay there again! Thank you, Eli!
We enjoyed the stay. Eli was extremely responsive.
Great spot and host! We’ll def comeback

Apartment is great, very comfortable and clean.
Great location at the north of Tel Aviv.
Avi, the host, is available and has a great attitude.
Highly recommended.

It was very easy to communicate with Eli, he helped us during our stay with a fridge issue we had and extending our stay. The apartment is nice but is located on a main road with a lot of noise (and windows are not sound proof). Cooking is easy in the kitchen but most of the furniture is very basic for a stay.

Superb location on Dizengof Ave., 5 minutes walk from the beach, TLV harbour and the park. Lots of restaurants bars and shops just near by. The place seems to be recently renovated, the kitchen is well equipped with everything you need for preparing your own meals. A couple of grocery stores in 100 meters radius. The host was super responsive, checkin was very easy.
Parking is a nightmare, the only viable option is 1km up in the harbour. Overall a great place, the only thing I would improve is the double bad mattress which is not very comfortable.

דירה יפה מפנקת

reviews.comments: Nice place to stay in one of the best place in Tel Aviv. Eli is a perfect host available at all times ....
I stayed by myself for a week. Great location. Host is very responsive and place is clean and cozy with all the basics one needs.

It's a good location close to the park and 1km from the beach in a nice area with lots of restaurants and shops and several grocery stores.There's  a lightful livingroom and two rather dark bedrooms (in one is a bed sofa that is not very comfortable - you clearly feel the metal bars when you lie down). They bedroom window are very close to the next building which is a policestation (parking police) where people work in shifts and which is rather busy. You can hear them talk still late at night. With the windows closed it was no problem (even our baby slept like a baby). The apartment itself is kind of a sublet and pretty full with things from the owners - which was not clear in the description. But it also meant that the kitchen is very well equipped and you can really cook there not like in other rental places. All in all we enjoyed the 3 weeks there a lot and whenever there was a problem Eli responded (often within minutes) and fixed things or took care of very quickly (same day or as soon as it was possible)
Все было замечательно! Рекомендую данные апартаменты! Чисто, 15 минут от моря, хорошо оснащена кухня, тихий район
אלי מארח מעולה. היה קשוב לכלל הצרכים, גם בקשות חריגות יותר. הדירה הייתה נקייה, נוחה ומסודרת

description: Fantastic for couples that want to enjoy together, Friends who want to have fun and anyone that need a spot in his business trip.Travelers that knows TLV can tell how hard is to find a well taken care -and affordable- place in the City.We put a lot of love to make our home the PERFECT place for you.The Location is TOP!!Beach, Restaurants, Bars, Coffee, Shops, Garden, Groceries? You have everything under the house!The spaceOur Apartment is unique in Tel Aviv landscape!  We restored it in our own hands and put a lot of love and energy in every detail.The Cool and Cozy design will make you FEEL LIKE HOME.The combination of Colors, Plants and different light options will give you the joy of changing the atmosphere according to your mood.The apt is 55m2, Ideal for a couple. The sofa is really comfortable and we provide linen for a third person.The Bedroom is amazing, with a big bed, King Koil new mattress.The Living Room is Super modern, with fun sofa, a Cable TV and wifi. The kitchen is really cute, well organized with all you need to make yourself an amazing time. A toaster oven, gas, and different electronic machines provides you with all the tools to spoil yourself.The bathroom and toilet conveniently separated, blossoming with plants, natural ventilation, bathtub and everything you need to give yourself a treat.The balcony can be used as a working area or just a nice place to chill and enjoy the unique atmosphere of Tel Aviv. If you are a smoker you are welcome to do so in the balcony.The apt Located in the 2nd Floor, There is no Elevator in the building.If you are coming with a car we recommend you to park it in the Dizingoff center parking lot. it's in front of our house and have an access 24/7.In case you are staying only in Tel Aviv we highly recommend to avoid using Car as Tel Aviv is an extremly busy city with a parking issue and public transporation is fantastic.Guest accessWe want you to feel Like HOME, we are opening our house and giving you the ability to enjoy everything we have to offer. We Just ask… Treat it as it yours!- We provide you with city guides, updated activities info, bicycle rentals, etc.- Fresh linen and towels are provided. For stays longer than 5 days spare amenities will be provided.- Hair dryer, shampoo, conditioner, soap.- Coffee, tea, sugar, etc.- TV blankets.- Free wifi- 50 inch cable TV.- Air conditioner in the living room and the bedroom as well.- Full equipped kitchen.- Bathtub with a shower.- Washing machine and dryer only available for long term rental (10 days or more).Other things to noteWe are happy to welcome you!!
additional_house_rules:
Smoking allowed only in the Balcony.

Take care of the house like its your own.

Use of coasters is mandatory.
interaction: We have a professional team to look out for you during your stay: With an eCongierge for any questions or problems you might be having & complimentary tips and additional services. After you book with us we will contact you with all the details and to know how much you would like us to be involved if at all...
transit: In the area there are many buses lines that are passing by and taxi drivers are in every corner.We suggest to walk the city or rent a bicycle, you will discover that everything is much closer than you imagine. Public Bicycles rentals users guide are provided. Its cheap, its fun, its fast, its telavivian!The Ben Gurion airport is not inside the city, you can get around by catching a bus, train or taxi, its a half an hour ride.

reviews.comments: The apartment was in a great location, was very well kept and the hosts super nice.  A solid stay!

Great place with cute decorating!! Very responsive and thoughtful hosts! The apartment is has a calm and relaxing vibe. The bed is super comfy!  Beware that it is an older building and 3 flights up. That didn’t bother us, but if you have any mobility issues, you should know. We would be happy to stay again!!

This is a great compact apartment in the center of Tel Aviv with all sorts of restaurants and amenities nearby! The apartment is exactly as it was described in the pictures. The internet was not great during my stay but the hosts are super responsive and have promised to update it. You will not go wrong with this one!

I had an amazing stay at Or & Candela’s place. Very clean and cozy/stylish apartment in a very good location. Central to everything ( beach, stores, restaurants etc..).
I would definitely recommend this place.
Thank you guys!!
Great place, location and most important amazing hosts! I'll be happy to stay there again!

If you are traveling to Tel Aviv, I completely recommend staying here! The apartment is beautiful.. the pictures don’t do it justice! Great location, everything you could need, comfy bed, and gracious, communicative hosts make this a true gem.
The apartment is beautiful, airy, lots of light and well-located.  And it's a great amoutn of space for two people.  I would absolutely stay there again.  You will not be disappointed.

We had our plans change at the last minute during our stay in Israel, causing us to end up at Or & Candela's place for two nights — and we're glad it happened that way! It's located right in the center of the city, as promised, so tons of places to eat/drink/see are within a really short walk.

They were kind enough to let us in early to the space to drop off our bags, given that we'd been up since 4:30 that morning, and were super responsive throughout.

The apartment itself is huge and super stylish. You probably won't be spending a ton of time there given all there is to do in Tel Aviv, but the kitchen is a great size and well-appointed. And the living room has a big, comfy couch with a giant TV when you want to relax a bit at the end of the day.
Neat, very clean and conveniently located place. Really wonderful and very responsive hosts!

Great basic amenities, super clean and super well located apartment right behind the Dizengoff Center Mall.  I loved the big bed, ample closets, and wide couch in the living room area with a new large smart TV (no cable).  Plenty of linens and towels.  Washer dryer on a cool looking roof.  Keep in mind this is a walk up building and the apartment is on a high floor.  Pack light! Or and Candela are great hosts, will definitely work with them again.
Looks just like the photos and the best location in Tel Aviv. Highly recommend for a stylish and convenient experience. Hosts were very responsive as well.

The apartment was absolutely AMAZING. The design and the details were outstanding and to the point. It is on the 5th floor so if you have a luggage, know this in advance. The location is PERFECT, the comfort of feeling at home is top notch. There are so many great places around to explore, I would stay here again 100%
reviews.response:
Hi Chloe,
Thank you so much for the review!
It was an amazing opportunity to host you and we are really looking forward to host you again.
We just want to let know, to other people that is reading the review, the apartment is located in the 2th floor.
It was a a key button mistake of Chloe ;)
We are trying to improve our service, and if you will need any assistant with carrying your suticases please write it down while booking.

Have an amazing day everyone!
Best wishes,
Or & Candela.

reviews.comments:
The apartment was cute with many nice design touches. The location is great and all the amenities and necessities in the apartment worked perfectly.

Or & Candela were very responsive and courteous. At one of the nights in our stay there was a very loud party next door until late at night, we told Or & Candela about it and they made a great effort to reach out to the authorities and make sure this doesn't continue too late. They also compensated us with an extra night in the apartment free of charge without us asking. I would greatly recommend staying in one of their houses and will happily do do again.
Amazing place in the center of Tel Aviv!

Thank you guys for being so nice and responsive, the place was exactly as expected and very homie, very clean, and very comfortable. would recommend to anyone that is not afraid of some stairs and would DEFIANTLY stay there again next time im in tel aviv.
A fun and chill apartment, we used it as a home\workspace while working from home and everything was great. Or & Candela were very approachable and nice.
Nice apartment with great hosts. Super-central location with very easy self-checkin. Close to everything. Nice place for both a work trip or vacation.

Beautiful place in the heart of Tel Aviv. Although it is so centrally located, it was very quiet in the flat. Total accuracy of pictures and description of the flat, actually in reality the flat is even nicer, we were really impressed and loved it there :-) Or and Candela were very helpful with everything and accommodated our needs at all times. We will definitely be back and can recommend this place to everyone!
Amazing location, place is like in the pictures. Lots of stairs to apt :)

Very nice, spacious and quiet place! Location is great!!! Highly recommended!!!
We would love to stay there again:) Thank you Or and Candela

This place is a real gem!  It’s bigger than I’d expected, and the decor was pleasant and uplifting.  Not only did the hosts leave detailed and simple check in and house instructions, they also met me upon check to show me around.  It’s conveniently located for some of the best restaurants in town, and ask a short walk from the beach.  Loved every room in this cute flat.  I’d definitely recommend solo travelers or couples for this place.

This place is in a great central location near the beach and near excellent restaurants. The apartment is clean and very stylishly decorated. The hosts were very friendly and helpful as well. I would reccomend this apartment to anybody!
This apartment exceeded all our expectations. The hosts were outstanding and it felt like home. We would not hesitate to stay there again.
Great apartment in great location
Lovely place

The apt is really well kept, cozy and clean. Bed is perfect!!! Everything new and clean in the kitchen ( no table for meals, only a small one in the balcony). 10 minutes walking from apt to the seaside, to the center, to everywhere. Good staying in one of the most expensive town of the mediterranean area.

The apartment was perfect! Super conveniently located to explore all of Tel Aviv & Jaffa, but calm and quiet. Easy to get to, but private and secure. It had all the amenities you would expect, plus a few nice touches. Bed was comfy and the whole apartment was sparkling clean. The balcony is particularly nice. Or & Candela were wonderful hosts, and the self check-in / check-out process was easy and convenient.

I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again or to recommend it for anyone.
Great, clean and spacious Appartment in a good neighbourhood. everything (and a little more) to enjoy the stay in Tel Aviv.
Very nice appartement, lovely details, fast communication, we had everything we needed, thanks!

Le logement est très bien placé, dans un quartier commerçant et très agréable, et il est proche de la mer.

La décoration est soignée et chaleureuse.
Le logement est propre et l’arrivée très pratique avec une arrivée autonome.

Il manque juste de quelques équipements de cuisine: micro-ondes et plats.

Le logement est très calme par rapport à l’extérieur, seuls les voisins de l’appartement au-dessus sont bruyants la nuit...

Mais le séjour a été agréable et pratique!

Quel bonheur d'arriver à destination et d'être si agréablement surpris par ce petit bijou, décoré avec tant d'attention et de goût et d'une propreté impeccable.
L'appartement est idéalement situé,à proximité ,à pieds ,de la plage, des magasins et des restaurants tout en étant au calme de part sa position car il donne sur une petite cour ou trône un arbre magnifique qui apporte l'ombre nécessaire sur le grand balcon très joliment aménagé. Un grand coups de coeur!!

description: Renovated apartment in a historic building in old Jaffa.Prime locaiton - 2 minute walk to the Flea Market, Clock Tower and many bars and restaurants.5 minute from the promenade and the old Jaffa Port.The apartment includes wifi, TV, air conditioning, a kitchen with a mini fridge and a Nespresso machine and a luxurious bathroom.There is a public parking lot nearby.The apartment is uniquely built, with original exposed bricks of the historic building, combined with a fresh, modern design.The apartment is located in the center of Old Jaffa, there are bars, restaurants, and ballrooms nearby so there might be some noise and music until midnight.

reviews.comments: Had a spectacular stay at the Fantasy Duplex Suite. This place is extremely comfortable and very well designed and the location is as best as can be if you are looking to make the best of Jaffa. You are a one minute walk from the flea market, bars and restaurants and a two minute walk to the the most beautiful beaches in Tel Aviv. The place is also a short distance from the Jaffa Port, Neve Tzedek and central Tel-Aviv and the abundance of scooters make getting around easy! David and Yossef were outstanding hosts and communication was a breeze. The only thing I would caution about is potential noise from nearby nightlife venues. If you are sensitive to that then keep that in mind. Other than that this place is epic!

המארחים היו תקשורתיים וזמינים מאוד. המיקום מאוד מרכזי (קרוב לכיכר השעון ושוק הפשפשים). הנכס מעוצב בצורה יפה ונעימה. המקום מותאם לזוגות. חשוב לדעת אך לא להירתע, שימו לב כי דלת השירותים שקופה. יש שתי טלוויזות חכמות, אחת בסלון ואחת על יד המיטה. אנחנו היינו מאוד מרוצים מהשהות שלנו בנכס ובהחלט ממליצים!

reviews.comments: Guy’s place is beautiful! Clean and new and special. He’s super nice and helpful. The Florentin neighborhood is a perfect place to start exploring the city, and the view over the city gives the apartment a special magic feel. Highly recommended!

description: Just 2 minutes walking distance from Frishman beach, my apartment will be your perfect place for your next vacation. Fully equipped kitchen and bathrooms. Beautifull terrace with cozy outdoor furniture. 3 bedrooms and a decorated living room. You will be in the heart of Tel Aviv just by the beach.It's a perfect place for a vacation!The spaceYou are welcome to enjoy the quality bedding, towels and sheets all of the top brands. You can fill the quality touch of our gusting in every corner. The "Le Petit Marseillais" soaps and shampoo will wait for you at the bathroom, a range of oils, vinegar, and spices placed in the kitchen. You will have a laundry machine, a dish washer, Nespresso machine and more. So, seat back, relax, and enjoy the hearts of Tel Aviv.

reviews.comments: Apartment was terrific! Excellent location, very comfortable, and good communication with host. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend the apartment!
Great location. Roomy. Otherwise decent. In line with price/quality that's usually found in Israeli AirBNB which in my opinion is vastly overpriced.
great stay great host you can always count on.

Adi’s place is in a great location and near the beach. It was clean and she was easy to
Communicate with. We would gladly stay there again.
Thank you!

Adi's place is beautiful- clean, bright, well-furnished, and in an amazing location. We were able to communicate easily, and the few hiccoughs we had were, overall, dealt with. I would absolutely recommend a stay here....
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Great area and quality of stay
The apartment was just as advertised, clean, comfortable, stylish, and best location! We loved it, and Adi was very responsive.
reviews.response: Thank you, Dalia!

reviews.comments: Had a great stay at Adi's place! As a frequent visitor to Tel Aviv, I couldn't have been happier with the location. It was a 2-minute walk to the beach and 2-5 minutes away from streets with great bars and restaurants. Adi was a wonderful host and extremely responsive whenever I reached out. Very clean and modern space that easily fit 4 adults comfortably.

One of the best places we stayed. Superb location. The hosts are excellent! Very responsive, flexible an nice. The house is well stocked and pleasant. Comfy beds and great kitchen. Lots of shopping around and 2 mins walk to the most beautiful Tel Aviv Beach. Will definitely be back.
Great host. Well coordinated accommodations. Very close to the beach!!!!
Best location in Tel Aviv!

The flat was wonderful and had everything we needed and lots of extras.  It's a great location near the beach and lots of shopping and restaurants, and it's very easy to take a bus anywhere in the city.  Three nice bedrooms, two full bathrooms, and a large living room and kitchen so plenty of space for friends or family to spread out.

First and foremost. Adi was exceptional in ensuring we can check-in in the wee hours of the morning with ease. The apartment itself was as described. Very clean and in a great location. Right by the beach and close to all restaurants, markets, and public transportation.  Highly recommend this apartment if you plan to stay in Tel Aviv. Also, they even offered transportation service if needed.

This is a beautiful apartment in a fantastic location. it is a very short distance from restaurants and shops and from the Mediterranean Sea. We had 5 adults and it was a very comfortable size. The kitchen is really great and there is a television with plenty of stations for those evenings after a long day of touring. We did not have the pleasure of meeting Adi personally as she was away. But when we needed her she was an email message away and responded promptly  I would stay in this apartment again and again.

Adi’s place was great and lived up to the expectations of the listing. We were 6 guests (4 adults and 2 toddlers) and found the place to be a perfect size.

Communication with Adi was easy and she was very responsive. The self check in was easy.

The location is great. Quiet street surrounded by many dining options and off course, the beach just a few minutes away. We would definitely stay again when we visit.
Wonderful location, great apartment, super close to beach with view of Mediterranean.  We’ll definitely come back.
Great place
The apartment was incredible. The location is my favorite, close to everything and with a balcony view of the beach! I would definitely stay here again.

The location is unbeatable. Less than a block to the beach (you can see the sea from the balcony), great restaurants nearby, and it's off of main roads so the location is quiet. The apartment is modern and stylish, spacious and comfortable. It was perfect for my family of 6.

We stayed at Adi’s apartment with our 3 kids. The apartment is very spacious, convenient, well equipped and renovated. It is ideally situated at a quite street, 2 minutes walk from Frishman’s beach. We would love to stay there again.

It is a great apartment. Location is super, but most importantly, it is not a rental primitive flat, but a real home. Lots of crockery/cutlery, good quality TV and video, great fridge, absolutely perfect design and decor. Indeed, luxurious flat.
And 100 meters to the best beach !
reviews.response: Thanks Lena!

reviews.comments: Adi’s place is located in one of the best locations in the city. It is 200 meters from one of Tel Aviv’s greatest beaches. The apartment itself is very spacious and looks inviting. I wish it was a bit cleaner when we arrived.
Everything which is written about the apartment you get and even more , the location is super , next to the beach , big apartment with a lot of space , we will be back .
Great location, clean and spacious.
Excellent apartment in a very good location and  fully equipped..highly recommend

Very nice appartement, very well located , spacious and very clean ! Adi is very reactive.
I highly recommend it! :)
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: We had a wonderful time in Adi's apartment! We highly recommend it
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Adi is really kind and helpful. Apartment is worth recommending! :)
Everything was great! Adi was really helpful with anything we asked , even for a free late check out because of our flight delay.
Great location, nice host.. almost everything was perfect. Hot water functioned only partially, despite boiler.
Spacious, very clean and well appointed flat in an excellent location a few minutes on foot from a well-kept beach.
I can highly recommend the apartment if traveling to Tel Aviv and want to be close to the beach

We were a group of 6 women and had a wonderful time in Tel Aviv.
The flat is perfectly situated a couple of minutes to Frishman Beach, which is a wonderful spot, lots of other beaches right around the corner.
Supermarkets, Shops, Restaurants all within a short walking distance.
The flat was perfectly clean, excellent bathrooms, very comfortable and enough room for all of us also very quiet.
Communication was brilliant.
We‘ll most definitely come back!!
Thank you very much!!!
reviews.response: Thanks Nici!

reviews.comments: Place is nice, location is great.
Clean & well located. A nice standard. Comfortable.

We absolutely loved our stay at 8 Mapu street. Adi and Ido were very easy to communicate with and are very friendly. Place was clean and had everything you could want. Great location too. Highly recommended...
reviews.response: Thanks Jackie!

reviews.comments:
This was a fabulous apartment. Brilliant location.
Very close to so many wonderful things to see and do, and very close to shops and restaurants.
Good place light and bright
Great!!!!
Adi responds very fast and is there to help if you have an issue.
everything was perfect!
This is an amazing big flat allocated 100 meters from the nice beach.  I strictly recommend it.

This apartment perfectly met our expectations.
Very modern, well equipped and clean, it totally suits to a family.
Its location is also a plus, being close to the beach (one block), many restaurants, shops and all transportation services.
We appreciated the easiness of the checkin/out, very adapted for early or late arrivals and the reactive support of the landlord to any of our requests.
Definitely a good choice for a Tel Aviv stay.
Lovely apartment with everything you can wish for. Clean and comfortable. And the landlord was always very friendly and helpful if we had any questions. Would recommend the apartment to any friends!
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Great flat, very clean, amazing location- 2 minutes from the beach. Will stay again!
Great location, spacious apartment and friendly hosts.
Amazing stay!! Great location, clean appartment, easy communication with the hosts. Would highly recommend.
reviews.response: Thank you!

reviews.comments: As a group of seven we had a great time at Adi's. The location right at the beach is perfect, the spaceous rooms provided enough personal space for everyone and communication with Adi was easy whenever we had questions. Would definitely book again.
Adi met us just as we got to the apartment. It was an absolute pleasure staying in the apartment. Was very clean and modern with a lovely balcony. I would stay here again
reviews.response: Thank you Sam!

reviews.comments:
This Apartment is located in the best area in Tel Aviv and also Adi makes every this with love and good taste. It was more that perfect everything and i hope only to come back soon. Next time this will be my first choice in Tel Aviv.

Thanks for everything...!!!
reviews.response: Thank you so much Carlos!

reviews.comments: דירה מושלמת במקום מושלם!
אירוח נפלא. בית שענה על כל הציפיות מבחינת המיקום, הנוחות, אביזרי מטבח ואפילו מגבות. היה נעים נוח וכיף. תודה.
דירהה שווה מיקום מנצח שווה כל שקל

הדירה הייתה מהממת ונקייה ומרווחת.
קרובה ממש לים ואיזור נוח ממש.

C’est un endroit parfait pour passer des vacances reposantes au calme proche de la mer et des transports . L’appartement est très fonctionnel rien ne manque vraiment et prendre les petits déjeuners sur la terrasse était un plus . En plus nous avons été accompagnés durant la sejour par Déborah quand nous avions besoin elle était très disponible
Je recommande cet appartement et j’y retournerai sûrement .

Tolles Appartment und extrem gute Lage! Die Wohung ist wirklich mit allem ausgestattet und direkt neben dem Strand, coolen Lokaten und einem großen Supermarkt!

Ich kann das Appartment von Adi sehr empfehlen!
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Hermoso departamento,  completo y confortable . Fui con mi marido y mis 3 hijos. La ubicación es excelente !
Super Standort für TEL Aviv,  perfekt für 5 Personen! Adi ist eine super Gastgeeberin und selbst als wir im Aufzug feststeckten kam schnell Hilfe. Wir würden es wieder buchen. Lg
Komplett ausgestattete, saubere Wohnung an sehr guter, strandnaher Lage.

reviews.comments: A really fantastic place to stay, the apartment was and comfortable, was right across the street from 2 beaches, and just a short walk to all the bars and restaurants. also, just far enough from the city center to still be fairly quiet at night. Gabi was a wonderful host. 10 out of 10

I stayed for 2 nights in this apt and I hope it will be available in the future when I visit Tel Aviv again! It is an amazing apt, beautifully updated and super super clean! Check in and out was super easy and quick and Gabi was very accommodating. Location is also fantastic with a side view of the beach below.
Great location Gabi is very responsive.
The apartment was as described and I will definitely return in the future. Excellent host and very responsive.
The flat was in a perfect location (2 blocks from the beach and the many restaurants and stores. The space was immaculately clean, much larger than I expected and very comfortable.
Great comfy apartment. Good mattress. Amazing shower. Clean. Perfect in every way.

Perfect beach spot! Simple, clean, convenient and very safe, which was important for a solo trip. Central to everything. If you need to book tours use Hilton for pick ups- it’s a 5 minute walk.

Couldn’t be more grateful to Gabi for meeting me at 4am and helping me with luggage!. Thank you!!!

What an amazing location! From the flat to the beach in 3 minutes, it’s like living on the beach. Super clean and update apartment. Great host. I will book this again for next year. I highly recommend staying here.
Gabi was very accommodating. We had to a couple changes to our itinerary and he helped us without any issue. Great host.  Not to mention the apartment was really cool and and an incredible location

PERFECT LOCATION! Walking distance from just about anything. Look out the window to the left and you’re staring right at the ocean. Beautiful apartment and Gabi is so kind and helpful. This apartment made our stay in Tel Aviv fantastic.

The best and tasteful apartment available in Tel Aviv I think.
Go stay forever

Gabi is very nice and responsive and an all around good guy. When we stayed there the apartment was in a great location for walking around the city. My biggest issue was with the hot water as it didn't work consistently for the first 4 days of our trip.
Incredible location in meticulously kept renovated appartment.
Great stay with a helpful host.
Gabi A+++, great Tel Aviv location.
Gabi was an outstanding host, with a perfect apartment for a Tel Aviv beach vacation. He was very accommodating as well. I highly recommend!

Gabi’s apartment is located in the north of Tel-Aviv, right by the beach. Everything is easily and quickly accessible from there by bus, train, foot or taxi with less bustle than you might find a bit South. Coming “home” to a clean, modern apartment right near the beach and promenade after a long day out was relaxing and enjoyable; getting to step out for a quick dip in the ocean or walk along the beach was the best! Gabi lives next door. He welcomed us warmly and made sure all amenities were available to us (including travel adapters and a local phone). Otherwise, he left us to enjoy our stay in an amazing city and apartment.

Had a great time. Great location and comfortable apartment!
Host was very accomodating and responded quickly to texts.
Thank you so much Gabi
Gabi was a great and attentive host who made my stay seamless.

Gabi's apartment is incredible. It is a minute walk to the beach, very close to nightlife and restaurants open late and grocery stores. It's got it all. The apartment is tidy and has lots of small extras. Gabi was also very responsive. I didn't have an adapter and he readily supplied me with one. I had an awesome time in Tel Aviv and had a great pad to crash at.

Gabi was super responsive, very nice, and very flexible with check in time — so very helpful.  Apartment was clean and ready early; he is nearby if you need anything.  Only thing is that the “sea view” is only there if you look out the living room window from a sharp angle—otherwise you are really looking at the building across the window.  Just don’t expect a beachfront view and it’s otherwise a great value for Tel Aviv.

This place was great! The location was fantastic - minutes away from the beach. The place was very clean and Gabi was very helpful and easy to get into contact with. We very much enjoyed our stay and would be happy to come back!!

Gabi was a terrific host, very responsive. The apartment is exactly as
described, very clean and works very well (easy to use washing machine; line drying; two burner stove top). Although it was in the 90s many days (in early May), the window shades made it easy for the air conditioning to handle that heat. There was some street noise some early mornings, but it did not disturb us, partly because of the air conditioning and
partly because the apartment is on the 3rd floor (US). Excellent location in a nice part of town with restaurants, cafes and the beach.
Gabi's place is perfect - newly renovated, modern & super clean and the best location! Gabi is super responsive and so helpful. We very highly recommend his apartment. Super

The apartment is cute and Gabi has everything you need including beach towels and a very quiet wash machine. It's very comfortable for a couple's short or long vacation stay. The apartment building is located in the very safe embassy area where the British Embassy is about 50m away and the Hilton Hotel is a block away. While it offers the quiet residential neighborhood atmosphere, you also have the busy commercial streets and the beautiful beach where restaurants, bars and shops are in walking distance. I love this location.

Gabi is a great host. He's warm, helpful and generous (gave us a free local cell phone to use during our stay). He lives right next door and no joke that he's your 24/7 concierge service. Take full advantage of his local knowledge!
Great location!!! Gabi was sweet, we enjoyed it!

Gabi was the absolute best! The place was wonderful. Perfect location especially to the beach and the main part of the port and Ben Gurion steeet and more. Get ready for a 4th floor walk up! I'll be back
Great location. Easy check in. Right by the beach!

Gabi's place  is just as pictured. The apartment was clean and the location is only a few seconds walk to the beach. Also a very short walk to many restaurants and night life - but his place stays very quiet.  I thought the location was perfect, I would walk up and down the beach every night. The washer is very nice to have and Gabi supplied several things to make my stay very enjoyable. The bed is very comfortable and the AC quickly cools the place.  A small grocery store is on the way to the beach and nice to be able to grab some things so nearby. I would stay here again when visiting Tel Aviv.
I had a great experience. I would definitely go back.
Great apartment and host
Great central location, apartment was renovated completely and is very clean.
Good place near the beach

Sometimes on Air B you wonder whether or not what is being advertised is what you will get.  I have to say that this apartment was everything it said it was and more!! Easy walk to the beach, to amazing shops and cafes, beautiful gardens. Gabi was super friendly and helpful. Highly recommend this gem!
Very nice apartment, very comfortable and in a great central location.  Gabi is a terrific host and was very accommodating with our check in and check out times.  Highly recommended.
good place with everything you need. gabi was very nice.

Gaby's apartment and his hospitality are absolutely fantastic!  Gaby could not be a more gracious host, eager to help and provide anything that one might need. The apartment itself is wonderful...perfect location right next to the beach. All the amenities are provided, the bed super comfortable, and everything perfectly clean.  Open up the window for an amazing side view of the sea, and having the sea air flow through the apartment is just terrific. One note is that there is no elevator and there are a few flights of stairs-- so that should be kept in consideration for some travelers. However, for those who dont mind a few flights of stairs I can not recommend Gaby and his apartment enough!

We had a wonderful experience at Gabi's apartment.  The apartment itself is very cute with an unbeatable location (a block from the beach) as depicted by the photographs.  The pull-out sofa was able to accommodate a third guest comfortably and the bed in the master was a good size.  Gabi was a great host and responsive to all of our needs.  We would definitely stay here again.

I had a wonderful experience in tel aviv staying at this apartment.  Gabi was very helpful and met me when I got there.  The apartment is very well done and has everything in it to make you feel like home.  The whole place is new inside and all works very well. The location is great and very close to Hilton beach.  I would highly recommend this place and will stay there the next time I visit tel aviv.

Gabi was flexible with my timing and prompt to help with anything I needed. The apartment was perfect for my stay, well-kept, and the location could not have been more convenient. The neighborhood is quite walkable as well. Thanks Gabi!

Gabi is a very good host. He is around to help, quiet and non-intrusive. I had easy time interactive with him. The apartment is nice and clean. If you want to stay in old Tel-Aviv close to the beach, Dizengoff and the port rent this apartment. I know I will next time. Thanks Gabi!

Gabi was extremely helpful in many ways. He was always available to us, loaned us a cell phone free and helped us with our transportation to Jerusalem. The unit is upgraded beautifully. The bathroom has a lovely rainfall shower . Bathroom and kitchen are modern. Gabi has pretty much thought of everything we could possible need. From shampoo and conditioner, laundry soap, dishwashing soap, Iron, tea/ coffee, clothes washing machine.
The location is great! Only one block from the beach! Also one block from a main street with shops and restaurants.
The only two drawbacks are that it is on the third floor without an elevator and the building itself (outside of the beautiful apartment)is dilapidated . We would definitely stay here again.

Perfect apartment, indeed!  Gabi's place is so ideally located, you won't believe it!  It's steps to the beach, the promenade, the marina, as well as main boulevards with shops, restaurants, cafes...even a place that serves breakfast 24-hours!  The apartment itself is so cute, modern, clean and comfortable, you really can't ask for anything more.  I was so happy to have a place where I could cook and do laundry and see the ocean from the living room window.  The stairs are a climb, but what awaits at the end is worth it, and then some.  And Gabi is such a gracious host.  He was super friendly and welcoming, easy to reach and communicate with, and very flexible about meeting me to give me the keys and show me around.  He was always available, but didn't hover--the perfect combination.  He even gave me a phone to use, at no extra cost, while I was there.  Thank you so much, Gabi!  I felt right at home in your little Tel Aviv hideaway!
Great unit location and view of the beach through the side window. Living space and shower well designed to the modern taste, plus the owner is super friendly and very helpful.

Gabi was a terrific host. He was there to welcome us upon arrival, and even helped to carry some heavy suitcases up the stairs. He even gave us an Israel phone to use within the country. The apartment was simple but had everything one could ask for. The location made this apartment even more enjoyable. I highly recommend this apartment to anyone visitng Israel. From first timers to frequent visitors, this apartment will not let you down.

Gabi greeted me the moment I arrived and immediately made me feel at home. The place is extremely well located, right next to the beach and the restaurants and cafes of Ben Yehuda and Dizengoff streets. The wifi was fast, the bed comfortable and the water pressure in the shower was excellent. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a 1 bed spot in Tel Aviv.

Gabi's apartment is beautifully decorated for a holiday rental, with a view from the side of the Mediterranean. Check in and out were simple, and the apartment was exactly as expected. It was great for what I needed for the night. I would highly recommend it!
Great experience! Gabi's apt was very clean and had great shower pressure. Best part was he gave me a free Israeli phone to use when I was in town. So thoughtful!!!

I'll just say that all the elaborate reviews about Gaby and his gorgeous place are just ... true!
No surprises here! just an honest guy with an impeccable place across the street from the beach!
Gaby, It was a real pleasure to spend my vacation at your place.

Thank you

Hello, I had the pleasure to come visit in the beautiful Tel Aviv, and I found this fabulous looking accommodation department Gaby, very nice, very comfortable, modern, and clean, really well located, thanks Gaby for everything, super attentive and friendly, if I will have the onor of Tel aviv revisit undoubtedly will stay in that department!

Gabi's apartment was in a great location right by Hilton Beach and was exactly as advertised, in tip top shape.  Gabi is an excellent host and you can tell he really cares about making sure his guests have a terrific vacation by going the extra mile.

Gabi was a wonderful host and very helpful! He even printed my boarding pass! And gave us a great recommendation for dinner "The Old Man & The Sea"!

The apartment is spectacular, has a view of the ocean and in a great location. I highly recommend staying at Gabi's!
Great apt and so close to the beach. You can see the ocean from the window in the living room.  Gabi is a great host and helped us out with finding a place to store our car for a few days.

Gabi was an excellent host! He was available if I needed anything and was communicative. His place was beautiful and clean and in the most amazing location (only a few blocks from the beach). I would highly recommend staying at Gabi's place and I would definitely stay there again on a return visit!

We had a wonderful stay at Gabi's apartment! We were warmly welcomed, and we really appreciated the bottled water and milk in the fridge when we arrived. Everything was provided, so we didn't need him very much. The use of a phone was a real gift. When we needed to figure out transportation to Jerusalem, he gave us all the contacts and costs. And of course the location right across from Gordon Beach was outstanding. Helpful tip: the cheapest place to buy sunscreen is in little store downstairs next door.

We enjoyed our stay in Gabi's apartment.  He is a welcoming and responsive host, and the apartment is clean, attractive, and well-equipped. The location is ideal for walking to the beach and to many of the other attractions in the city. It was a good home base during our stay in Tel Aviv.
Gabi is a wonderful host! I stayed at his apartment for 12 days and it was Perfect. Gabi is there to take care of your every need. I will definitely stay there again.
Great Host and great location!

Gabi is very helpful, accommodating and super friendly. The apartment is perfect, with a great location, close to beach and the great shopping, restaurants, everything.

Perfect place to stay with a gracious host

Gabi was a wonderful host. He accommodated our unusual 4am arrival, and communication and responsiveness was top-notch. The apartment was immaculate - clean and modern with all the amenities you need. We had an issue with the circuit board getting frequently overloaded, but Gabi was responsive and corrected the issue hastily. Location is great, walking distance to several desirable places, including beach, and main roads with retail/restaurant/bar establishments. I would highly recommend this apartment for stay in Tel Aviv, especially by the beach.

Gabi is a great host and the apartment is exactly as stated in the description.  Super clean, close to the beach, and centrally located.  Gabi is a very kind and warm man and welcomed us to Tel Aviv politely.  I would stay there again if I  came back to Tel Aviv and highly recommend the apartment to others.

Gabi was a gracious host. He provides everything you need for a wonderful stay. His apartment is in the best location, close to the beach, restaurants, bars, and shopping. The place was clean, comfortable and very well kept. I would be happy to stay there again. Thanks Gabi!
The reservation was canceled 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Amazing location, nice aparment and very friendly and communicative host!
Gabi’s place is great. It is compact, clean and convenient. Gabi himself is the perfect host. He even lent me a mobile phone with credit during my stay. I thoroughly recommend his place
Gabi is a great host. His place is well decor and clean. Location is excellent, just across the beach.
Clean & good value
Great location, simple but comfortable place, has all basic amenities.
I definitely recommend this place! It is super close to the beach as well as to plenty of amazing bars and restaurants.Gabi is an excellent host and I would book this place again.
Nice flat next to the beach
Perfect place to stay in Tel Aviv. Extremely clean. Gabi was very prepared and extremely hospitable. Would stay there again.
Gabi’s has perfect location for those who seek both sunny beach and enjoy the city life. Much recommend!

Gabi is a wonderful host and the hospitality I received was exceptional
Quick responses and a great place to stay
thanks!
The apartment is clean and very well located. Gabi was a great host and communication went very smoothly!
Nice place not far from the beach. 3rd floor, no elevator.

Gabi made our arrival so nice by meeting us in the street and helping with our luggage up the stairs. This was the start of a perfect stay in Tel Aviv. The apartment is located in an ideal spot for the beach... literally minutes away. Everything has been thought of in this compact spotless lovely apartment to make for a really great holiday.  We appreciated the washing machine and line to dry everything outside the window. We will certainly return and recommend It 100%. Thank you Gabi

Second time in two years that i have stayed in this apartment. A fantastic location two minutesfrom the beach. The apartment is super clean and Gabi is a terrific host. Can't wait until the next time!

Gabi Gabi Gabi .. A wonderful human being, kind , helpful and a great host.. location is super convenient.. every thing is close by.. my permanent stay in Tel Aviv.. thanks a lot Gabi.. are you soon ..
Location was very convenient for my needs. Gabi was easy to communicate with and since he lives in the unit next door, it was particularly convenient. Shalom Gabi!

I stayed here for a month, and this place was perfect. The apartment is clean, modern and cosy. Gabi is a wonderful host, and was so helpful and made my stay super comfortable. The building is a quiet one, despite being on a busy street and you have easy access to restaurants and the beach together. I would highly recommend this place for any length of stay. This truly was a home away from home.
Very nice apartment, super location, very well equiped, hospitle host. Value for money!
Great hospitality! Recommended
Very basic but good space.  Clean and simple, the host lives next door which makes it very easy to communicate.
Clean place at a great location. Had a perfect stay!
Very nice apartment in a great location, clase to everything, and comfortable!
Very nice place and a great hospitality

The apartment is relatively small, but fully equipped (incl. kitchenette  with stove and microwave).  The location is great, next to the beach and while the street itself is quiet it is in a lively area. Gabi is very responsive to e-mail/phone and was very accommodating. We enjoyed our time in Tel Aviv and can recommend staying at Gabi's apartment!
Gabi made check-in and check-out very easy. The apartment has all the amenities you would need and best of all is a stone's throw from the beach. A really enjoyable stay, thanks.
Great place, convenient to beach and very cosy. Not noisy at all.

Gabi made me very welcome from the moment I arrived. He was always on hand to assist if I needed it. The apartment was immaculate and comfortable and the AC was very good. The location is great just a short walk from the Gordon pool.

This was the perfect spot for me - near the action and the sea and everything worked perfectly. Very good value. Well done Gaby who even gave me his spare mobile so I could use it for local calls. Now that’s being helpful. Would definitely visit again.

Staying a gabis was fantastic, location is amazing, the flat beat my expectations by a long way and was perfect for the 4 days I was staying there. I will be staying here again and would highly recommend!

Gabi is exactly what everyone wants in a host — there whenever you need him, invisible when you don’t.
We arrived at 0600, but for Gabi it was just a minor inconvenience. He lives next door. The flat had everything we needed. It was all very well thought through so that whenever we needed something, there it was. As travel journalists, we travel with lots of devices that need electricity so we were glad to see so many outlets. Too many other points to mention. It was great to so near the beach. The only short straw was the lack of an elevator, but we knew that going in, so no big deal. Thanks Gabi. We highly recommend your flat in Tel Aviv.
Amazing location. Smooth check in. Gabi was very nice and let me stay later than the original check out time. I would definitely come back!
Many thanks, Gabi, for an amazing visit!
Thoughtful host.very hygienic .I would recommend .
Great flat. Excellent location.
Super great!

First time that I used Airbnb for business trip and Gabi's apartment was a great choice.
Everything was perfect from easy check in to great bed for a good night sleep.
Next time when I am in Tel Aviv I will again stay with Gabi.
Thanks Gabi for everything!
Everything was perfect thank you!!
A perfect apartment for a longer visit to Tel Aviv

I had my flight delayed of one day and Gabi was really kind to open me the apartment at 7:00 in the morning.
The apartment itself is cute, with everything needed and close to the beach, about 5 minutes by walk. Probably the description "On the beach" + the image are a little bit misleading as you can see the beach only putting you head outside one of the windows. Still, it is probably one of the closest apartments. The double bed was really comfortable, I had zero problem in falling asleep.

Very simple and convenient flat, ideally located. Gabi is a very friendly host. He kindly lent us an Israeli mobile phone. Despite the advertised sea view on the listing, the flat view overlooks another building; the sea can actually be seen when looking left with a specific angle.

This was the second time we stayed in Gabi's apartment. Gabi is a wonderful host and very helpful. The apartment is beautiful and you can see that Gabi put a lot of love and thought into designing the apartment. It was perfectly clean and had everything we needed and could wish for. The beach is very close (2 minutes) and also other places can be easily reached by foot or by bicycle. We enjoyed our stay very much and will stay there again when we are back in Tel Aviv. I highly recommend Gabi and his apartment.

The location is perfect, most places (Machane Yehuda Market, Ben Yehuda Street etc.) are within walking distance, but it's still quiet at night. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed. Communication with Daniela was easy. We enjoyed our stay at this apartment and will certainly be back!

Came back after a trip to Jerusalem. What can one say..a real menche is our Gabi.
Any help he could provide was not too hard.
The place was our home away from home.
Clean, functional and well maintained.
Such a good position and very reasonable value even with our poor Oz dollar.
Highly recommended.

Extremely and courteous. High standard of presentation and cleanliness. Apartment is great for couples who can walk up/down 3 flights.
Internet is very good with no dropout.
Excellent position to beach, Hilton hotel. Bus stops close by in BenYehuda and Arlozorov.
Minimart 100m
Highly recommended.
Thank u Gabi..you are great

Gabi is a very warm guy and giving. The apartment is very invested, and I'm not ashamed to say it is the most invested apartment that I have been through Airbnb. Gabi is available 24/7, when you get and give the apartment or if there is any problem with the apartment.
We arrived to the apartment to family vacation, me, my wife and our two years old daughter. When we first get the apartment, there was a wind and chocolate, because it was my wife's birthday. The apartment was very clean; it seems like Gabi paints the apartment every day. The apartment had everything we needed for the vacation. Needless to say the location of the apartment, it's in the center of Tel Aviv, near to the sea. It's possible to see the sea from the living room window. The bed is big enough for two people and a child, queen size.
I really don't have a bad word, no on Gabi or the apartment.

Perfect arrangement, Gabi very welcoming and nice, a superb location, the apartment clean and well organised and stuffed with whatever we could need, the view of the sea a bit sideways but great.
A great stay altogether, thanks Gabi.
Gabi is a very nice man, we had a great time in his apartment. It was very clean, comfortable and close to the beach.

Gabi who was staying next door was there to welcome me. The pictures and the actual place was about the same except that you need turn your head out of the window to see the sea. The bed was just nice and the wifi was stable too.
Excellent apartment, well furnished and decorated, close to the beach and from several touristic attractions. On top of that, our host is very pleasant and kind.

Gabi was very welcoming. He was there to meet me on arrival and provided me with all the information that I needed. The listing was completely accurate , the apartment was newly renovated, modern and perfectly clean. It was situated in a great neighbourhood , close to shops, transport and the beach. I would recommend this apartment.

First, Gaby is ideally located, near the beach and a beautiful promenade.
Then, he welcomes you in a very clean abd very functional apartment, with a fully equiped kitchen.
You even have an available cellphone for communications in Israel. And if you need anything, he brings it to you.
In short, the host is warm and human, I will certainly come back.

Great host, great location - no point to look further - an excellent stay.  I have been to TLV many times and this location was the best.  Gabi was extremely helpful and provided many necessities in the apartment.

Gaby was a brilliant host! He met us at the apartment and everything was exactly as he described. The apartment was in a perfect location and we really appreciated the wifi, phone and washing machine. The apartment was brand new and very clean.Thanks for having us !

Everything was perfect - fantastic location, great apartment, exactly as per the photos and description, with everything you need for a great stay in Tel Aviv - extra towels for the beach and phone with local sim included which came in very handy for making restaurant or taxi bookings. Will definitely stay here again when in Tel Aviv - Gabi was the perfect host - very friendly and helpful - thank you so much!

It was a great time! Thx Gabi
I liked the appartment very much! Great located!

The apartment was good, it can be noisy as the window of the room gives on the street.
Gabi was a good host.
I was in Tel Aviv on a conference and the flat was a nice centrally located quiet place to stay

Gabi was a perfect host for hosting my parents a few days in TLV. His apt is lovely and fully in line with the pictures, he was also very available when we needed something.
I recommend!

Best experience of a short term rental in Tel Aviv. Gabi has been an amazing host in ALL aspects: effective communication, anticipation. Hospitality, leaving all you may need in the flat, practical aspects......

The appartment is just an amazing clean place with a very suitable furniture, ALL amenities, proximity to the beach and all attractions.

A great experience !

Lovely apartment which seems professionally designed, and fully equipped with all necessities. Located in a great location, close to the beach and lot of cafes, bars and restaurants. Staying was very comfortable, recommended!

Gabi was a very welcoming host indeed. The apartment is as it looks, with a lovely orange seventies armchair. Good neighbourhood, very convenient for the beach, excellent local restaurants and cafes. You can rent bikes from just nearby. Sea view. Highly recommended.

Gabi is a wonderful host! He welcomed us into what we thought was the "Perfect Apartment" in Tel Aviv. It's location is amazing, allowing us to walk everywhere we wanted to visit in the White City. We were extremely comfortable in the apartment and felt that it met more than all of our needs. We will stay at Gabi's again the next time we visit Tel Aviv, which can't be soon enough.

The place was beyond expectations. Gabi was fantastically helpful and yet respectful of space (he lives just next door so is on hand if you need anything) very warm and welcoming in all respects.

The property itself is more spacious than the photos give it credit for with enough appliances and modern conveniences to fulfill most needs unless you plan on being at home and cooking every evening. The beach is a few minutes walk past a shop which has all basic products and is in good proximity to the main eating and drinking areas.

We would stay again if we were visiting tel aviv.

The Apartment is great and exactly as described. You have evrything you need from a washing mashine to aircondition and a microwave, oven, hairdryer, towels... Perfect! The internet works great!
The windows are big and thats really great, cause you get a lot of sunshine and a nice seabreaze (if you want to, you can also shut the shades).

The flat is near to the beach, so 2 minutes and you can relax by the sea.
It is very central too, and lots of shops are close.
As the Apartment is located right at the Hayarkon street, you hear the traffic. For us it was no concern and you can close the windows to have it really calm.

Gabi is the nicest host, and was available all the time, helping us in every matter.
We strongly recommend staying at Gabis Apartment and would love to come back again!

Gabi's apartment was just perfect for our 4 day stay in Tel Aviv. It was very clean, had everything we needed and is located just 2 minutes from the beach. Gabi is a very attentive host! He lives next door and is easily available. Gabi gave us a cell phone to use for local calls and he even thought of providing us with a bottle of cold water. We highly recommend staying here!

We really enjoyed our stay at Gabi's appartment. It was exactly as described on the site, and the location is perfect for Tel Aviv's great beaches, restaurants and bars. Gabi is a friendly and helpful host, providing a local phone for guests' use is a really nice touch
This is a really cute, beautiful, clean, and homely apartment in Tel Aviv's most beautiful beach neighborhood! Gabi is such a kind, warm-hearted, wonderful, and caring host! We loved our time here!

Gabi was very quick to respond to any questions and concerns and was very helpful right from the time of reservation.  He is not at all intrusive, yet always was available and friendly.  He explained the apartment and the neighbourhood upon arrival, and the apartment was clean and orderly.  It was well-equipped and having a phone was especially convenient.  I have stayed elsewhere in Tel Aviv and each area has its advantages and charms, but for proximity to the beach and the centre, this location is exceptional.  Overall, a very enjoyable experience which I would recommend.

It was a perfect visit to Israel. Gabi's apartment is clean, cozy and located only 2 minutes walking of the sea and 30 seconds away of the supermarket. You can see a beautiful park and breath with fresh air that is blowing from the sea, which you can see out of the window also. Shops, cafes, restaurants, beach - you have everything to enjoy your holidays in Israel exactly next to you!
Gabi is unbelievably hospitable, kind and respectful. He really has everything you need in his apartment!
He took care about our visit starting with water and milk in a fridge, coffee, tea and sugar on the shelf and (what was really unexpectedly pleasant for me!) he presented me a bottle of wine, knowing that I have a birthday those days! And the last, but not the least, Gabi gave us the local mobile telephone to use it while we're in Israel to talk anyone we need in Israel!
So, if you ask my advise, I will indispensably recommend to stay at Gabi's!

Really: everything was (Email hidden by Airbnb) pletely renovated, with nice furnishings and modern kitchen and bathroom. All you need is provided for: towels, beach towels, shower gel, shampoo, kitchen accessories, tea, coffee and even a free mobile phone for national calls! Gabi lives right next door (the B&B was made by dividing his own flat, which used to be very big) and is very flexible with check-in and check-out times. If you really want to find a negative side: the nearby road is a bit noisy, but not too bad. Plus you can literally see the beach!

My husband and I just returned from a lovely lovely visit to Tel Aviv. Gabi's apartment was perfect for our needs.  Well located near the beach and comfortable in every way.  We highly recommend this accommodation.

Excellent location. Neat and clean. Accomodations are basic but appropriate. The apt. Is located on a 3rd. Floor without elevator, which can be especially taxing when moving in or out. Host is helpful and available.

The apartment was REALLY nice! Was very clean and had everything you need for a perfect stay. It is well equipped and even had a laundry machine. Gabi is just the perfect host! Very friendly and ready to help you with ANYTHING you need: doubts, suggestions or any possible issue. And doesn't end here, he's always smiling and doing all the possible for you to have the best time in Tel Aviv. The location is great, just 5 min walk from the beach, many nice restaurants around, a small supermarket with everything you need just 2 min walk. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Gabi was just the perfect host. We throughly enjoyed our stay at this beautiful apartment. Gabi assisted us in providing us with a mobile phone, lots of local tips and even assisted us with getting into see a dentist for some emergency work.
The apartment itself is perhaps better than the pictures do justice. It's very modern and clearly recently renovated. Would highly recommend.
perfect week in this appartement, very clean, very good localisation in tel aviv !!

Gabi is a fantastic host who makes you feel at home.

The appartment is clean, modern and fully equiped.

We highly recommend it!

Great apartment in tel aviv. I was many times in Tel Aviv, but this was the best apartment that I ever had there. Very clean and so nice. The location is in front of the beach!!! Gabi is a very nice host. We had everything we need. I will go only in this apartment. It's the best. Thank you for the great week in this nice place.

We very much enjoyed our stay at the apartment. Gabi was an efficient and consciencious host and we found him very helpful. The apartment is well located for access to the beach and to the main attractions of Tel Aviv. Usefully there is a supermarket very nearby. The apartment is well furnished. The kitchen and bathroom are well appointed and modern. Nice apartment, reliable owner.

Gabi was a very gracious and accommodating host -- he kept in touch with us while we were planning our trip and arranged to meet us in spite of our late arrival. He also offered to help my wife arrange her departure, even though it was at 4am in the morning.

The apartment is well-located, close to the beach and walking distance to the new marina area. There are also bicycle rentals just one block away. Within 2-3 blocks, there is a very nice area of restaurants and shops.

The apartment itself is small, but plenty of room for 2 people. It was clean and had everything we needed. The only downside is that it is a 4 floor walk-up unit, so could be a challenge for people with heavy luggage.

Apartment is situated in perfect place - in the center of Tel Aviv and near the beach. Gabi was very helpful and nice. Apartment is clean, cosy, and i had everything i needed in it. I recommend  this nice place for everyone for pleasant vacation in Tel Aviv!!!

We enjoyed our stay a lot. The appartment was clean, light with all the necessary kitchen utensils, towels, shampoo and so on. We were even given a local phone to make our calls for free.
The location is the best - it is close to the sea and to a big park. All the main streets are in a walking distance. There is a supermarket next door and lots of restaurants in the neighbourhood.
Gabi (the host) is beyond praise! I do recommend this appartment to all the travelers!
Very nice and clean apt in a good neighbourhood right behind the marina. Gabi was easy and friendly too - all in all a supernice week in Tel Aviv!

beautiful appartment in the very heart if tlv (2 min to the beach, 2 min to dizzengoff st), gabi is a very kid, supporting and flexible host; the appartemnt is tastefully furnitured, clean and spacy; absolutely recommendable

I wanted a cozy and affordable spot near the water to celebrate my husband's birthday in Tel Aviv, and we found it! The apartment is, of course, small, but perfectly appointed with everything you need. It was spotless and seemed brand new.  It's a side unit, so you have to look left at the window to see the view - but it's a great view of the water. Gabi was an amazing host. He lives next door, so he was available if we needed to ask questions. He was friendly but never intrusive. I noticed his hospitality even in the small details - the way the shampoo bottles were arranged with the English side forward since he knew that we didn't speak Hebrew. Thank you Gabi!

Well, Gabi was perfect. Kind, polite, reserved and very helpful. I arrived in Tel Aviv in an odd time (3AM) and when I got to the apartment there was Gabi waiting for me at 4AM with a smile and some fresh fruits.
I just regret not have had time enough to be there for more few days.
The apartment is indeed great, clean, smelling new (so my Israelis friends told me so just after opening the front door of the place).
As I said to Gabi, that apartment is my Official Residence in Tel Aviv from that day on.

Gabi is amazing. After a warm welcome he showed me the flat which is perfect and very well located (just behind the Hilton). The flat, recent, was also very clean. Gabi cares about the well being of his tenants and hence provides a well appreciated service ; he makes himself available for you and so the check-in and check-out were only easier.
I definitely recommend this place and Gabi.

The apartment is impecably clean, nicely decorated and stocked with all the necessities. The friendly host lives right next door, so when we needed some help with WiFi he showed up literally in 30 seconds and sorted out the problem. The only minor disappointment was that the beach view depicted on one of the photos is visible only if you lean out of the window. Overall, great value for money.

This apartment and its host (Gabi) were fantastic. The apartment has everything you need, It is comfortable, in immaculate condition and close to all that Tel Aviv has to offer with the beach, shopping and restaurants all within 5 min walk. Gabi was to most amazing host and made our whole experience effortless and delightful. Cant wait to get back to this place!

Gabi was a fantastic, friendly and helpful host and the apartment is in a great location. It was very clean and a perfect place to stay with everything you need. We would happily stay there again and definitely recommend it!

A nice and well kepted apartment. Everything seems new and modern and the kitchen is well equipped with the basic things you need. You have a nice view of the ocean from one of the windows. The street is quiet with no noise. We enjoyed our stay in this apartment.
Gabi was a very friendly and helpful host and the apartment was perfect with everything that you could need! I would definitely stay there again
The flat couldn't be better located and is right on Gordon Beach. It was very clean and newly renovated. Gabi was a lovely host. I would definitely stay there again.
Bel appartement odeur noseabondes devant la porte et bruyant

דירה מעולה!
מיקום מדהים!
חוף הים במרחק נגיעה..
גבי איש מקסים!
ממליצה בחום!
מומלץ מאוד
非常美的海滩美景，生活交通便利，主人热情，容易沟通。房间很干净，所有的设施都很方便好用。强烈推荐！

Gabi est un hôteattentionné, disponible et à l'écoute.
L'appartement est très fonctionnel, très propre avec une literie de qualité qui assure d'agréables nuits.
L'appartement est très bien situé, au coeur de la ville et très près des plages. Rien à redire si ce n'est que je recommande vivement sans hésiter ! Je reviendrai avec grand plaisir ! Merci encore à Gabi pour son accueil.
все соответствует описанию
Die Lage ist perfekt und der Vermieter ist sehr aufmerksam.

Спасибо Gabi, принял хорошо.
Квартира обычная, хорошо выполняет функции: переночевать и приготовить покушать. Удобное расположение. Заявленный вид виден с окна, если повернуть голову влево. Окно выходит прямо на соседний дом. В квартире два кондиционера, в не сезон в квартире прохладно, оставлять включенные кондиционеры не находясь в квартире запрещено.
В основном квартирой доволен, в тёплый период думаю там идеально. Рядом магазины, кафе, рестораны, пляж, парк.
Приятно что Gabi выделяет мобильный телефон. Живет он рядом, за стенкой, ответит на любой вопрос и просьбу.
Спасибо Gabi

Tutto quanto perfetto!
La casa, seppur non molto grande, è tagliata bene e risulta essere molto comoda e spaziosa.
La casa da fuori sembra un po datata ma dentro è molto moderna e bella.
Ringrazio molto il Sig. Gabi che è stato molto gentile e disponibile.
Dovessi tornare a Tel Aviv saprei già dove andare.
Consigliatissimo.

cumplio con todo lo q prometio previa reserva. Me presto un celular a su cargo para q estuviera comunicada de manera gratuita todos los dias de estadia en Tel Aviv.
Cuando me retire me acompaño a tomar el bus cargando la pesada valija q llevaba.
El depto esta muy bien ubicado, limpio, con todo lo.necesario.

Sinceramente tres dias excelentes!
Gracias Gaby!

Mein Gastgeber war zuverlässig, sehr fürsorglich und warmherzig. Er hat mir den Koffer bei meiner Ankunft hochgetragen! Und bei meiner Abreise wieder hinunter. Auf meine Wünsche ist er unmittelbar eingegangen, wobei es nicht viel zu wünschen gab, denn alles, was ich brauchte, habe ich in dem Appartment vorgefunden. Es war so wie beschrieben. Alles modern, sauber und gepflegt. Gabi wohnt gleich nebenan, so dass es auch leicht war, mit ihm in Kontakt zu treten. Die Nähe zum Meer ist genial. Ich komme gerne wieder.
Нам понравился отдых в целом.были 17 дней.квартира не далеко от пляжа и ресторанов.хозяин приветлив и отзывчив.

Tout d'abord excellent accueil par Gabi dont la gentillesse et la disponibilité sont exemplaires . L'appartement est très propre, très fonctionnel et bien équipé et très bien situé ( 5 minutes de la plage ) pour les amateurs . Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Tel Aviv et tous nos déplacements se sont fait à pied sans difficulté en grande partie grâce à la situation l'appartement .
