description: Comfy design flat in great location! Stay in the heart of the famous Fleamarket and experience an impressive fusion between traditional Jaffa style and modern comfort at our beautiful studio, perfectly located to explore the city or for relaxing beach days. We are passionate travelers who have been around the world and created this unique accommodation to host people from all over the globe, share experiences and give them valuable local insider tips of Israel.Looking forward to hosting you!The spacePerfect location, top comfort, spotless cleanliness, great value and friendly, knowledgeable local hosts - JAFFA Design Studio is proud to offer you all this and more! Our modern design furniture and high quality mattresses combined with hand picked antique items in a light flooded open space are elegant, beautiful and comfortable. The studio is spacey and boasts high standard with 2 large balconies to enjoy typical Jaffa city views. Explore Jaffa, Tel Aviv and even all of Israel by day trips from our lovely place. Don’t hesitate to contact us for advice, we’re happy to help you planning. Looking forward to welcoming you at JAFFA Design Studio!
additional_house_rules:
Please be respectful to the surrounding neighborhood and keep noise levels to a minimum. The building is family oriented and does not tolerate any party activities. 
Smoking on balcony ONLY.
Kindly do the dishes and keep the apartment tidy.
interaction: We are happy to assist you with anything you need before and during your stay. Please don’t hesitate to contact us!
transit: Public transportation to all directions within a short walk, excellent connection. City bikes, city scooters and taxis are available everywhere in Jaffa.Walking is a real option, 15-20min to Shuk haCarmel, 30min to Dizengoff area. Beautiful walk on promenade from Jaffa Harbor until Tel Aviv Port 5km, great for walking/jogging and any type of other outdoor activities.

reviews.comments: The apartment is fantastic.  The bed and bedding is super comfy.  Everything was sparkling clean.  Jaffa is charming.  I can’t wait to go back.
nice place in a great location. Owner is very responsive and helpful.

Fantastic experience at Catalina’s studio! Great location, beautiful, sunny, high ceiling, modern, quiet & clean apartment. Communication with the host was clear and to the point! Highly recommend it and we will definitely stay at Catalina‘s apartment in the near future.
had another lovely stay at Catalina's!
everything was great!

The place is nice, modern and comfortable, clean and exactly like shown on the pictures. Catalina is a very nice host. We came with two babies and she made sure to make baby soap and toys available to us. The apartment is close to many cool Jaffa places to explore (e.g. the market), and is yet in a quiet street. If you come with a car and many pieces of luggage as we did, be aware that there is no easy parking in the near vicinity (we had to park 5 minutes walk from the place).

Catalina’s place is even better than advertised. Very clean, stylish, with a lot if attention to small details and it had everything you could need for a stay. The location is great, the street is nice and close to supermarkets and landmarks. Will definitely revisit!

Catalina’s place is as advertised! The studio was clean, spacious and easy to find. Catalina is one of the best hosts I’ve encountered, willing to go out of her way to make your stay special. Thank you so much!!!
Beautifully designed place! Easily accessible, sparkling clean, and in a great location. Highly recommend!

Catalina is very helpful and speaks many languages.

Catalina's place was even better than advertised. Clean, beautifully decorated, size true to photos, and a prime location in Jaffa.  She was a courteous host and have excellent tips and advice. Couldn't have wanted more from a place. Don't waste your time looking elsewhere. This place was great

I had a great time in Tel-Aviv thanks largely to my choice of this apartment.

The bed was super comfortable and the shower was amazing!  HIGHLY recommend to anyone looking for a great experience in Tel Aviv.  Would definitely stay here again!

Catalina’s place is amazing! It’s three blocks from the beach, Jaffa, shopping, and some great bars and restaurants. Catalina was also a great host and easy to communicate with. The place was extremely clean. I would definitely Stay here again if in TLV.

What a great place to stay in Jaffa.  Catalina was wonderful.  She helped us out with planning a day trip, recommending some places to eat and she was all around helpful.  The studio was super clean and you could not ask for a better location.  We were very happy staying here.
Catalina’s place in one of the best places I stayed at in Tel Aviv! Can't wait to come back there next time I'm in Tel Aviv.

В зимнее время года может быть холодно, лучше взять с собой тёплые носки. Но так всё отлично! Каталина замечательная хозяйка. Спасибо ей за тёплый приём.
Alles war sehr gut - wir waren vollstens zufrieden.
הדירה הייתה מדהימה מכל בחינה! המיקום מצויין, דקה משוק הפשפשים ועדיין ברחוב צדדי ושקט. הדירה יפה ונקיה וניכרת מחשבה על הפרטים הכי קטנים. התקשורת עם קרולינה הייתה מצויינת.

Catalinas Unterkunft können wir zu 100% weiterempfehlen! Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und es hat uns an nichts gefehlt. Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und stilvoll eingerichtet. Ein Highlight sind die beiden Balkone. Die Lage der Unterkunft ist ideal, um von dort aus Unternehmungen in der Stadt zu starten. Mit E-Scootern kann man jeden Spot Tel Avivs in weniger als einer halben Stunde entspannt erreichen. Besonders gut hat uns die Nähe zu den vielen leckeren Cafés und Restaurants in der Altstadt gefallen. So musste man abends keine großen  Wege auf sich nehmen, sondern konnte bequem in der Nachbarschaft essen gehen, was auch nur zu empfehlen ist. Catalina ist sehr zuverlässig und unkompliziert in der Kommunikation. Sie hat uns viele hilfreiche Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt gegeben und wir hatten einen sehr gelungenen Aufenthalt in Tel Aviv! Die Unterkunft würden wir bei einer nächsten Reise wieder buchen.
Jeg kan bestemt anbefale Catalina. Nem og kommunikere med, svaret hurtigt, og hun er meget høflig og god til og forstå hvilke ønsker man har for et ophold. Hun for de varmeste anbefalinger herfra.

Die Unterkunft von Catalina ist mit Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet und sehr sauber. Die Lage ist sehr gut, es gibt viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Cafés , Bars.. u.v.m. in der Nähe. Der Strand ist fußläufig erreichbar.
Catalina hat mich sehr herzlich empfangen und war jederzeit für jegliche Fragen erreichbar. Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt und gerne wieder.
Catalina ist immer da, wenn man sie braucht - dabei total entspannt ! Sehr schön wars!!

Catalina war ein super Host und die Unterkunft nicht nur perfekt sauber und gut gelegen, sondern hat richtig zum Wohlfühlen eingeladen. Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder! :) Alles einmalig und perfekt! Vielen Dank!
Die Wohnung ist sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet und entspricht allen Wünschen, die man als Reisender hat.

name: Lovely apartment on ROTHSCHILD Boulevard
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Elevator - The home or building has an elevator that’s at least 52 inches deep and a doorway at least 32 inches wide.
Single level home - No stairs in home
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: סטודיו 20 מ"ר. קומה ראשונה. מואר ומאוורר. טלוויזית של YES. המחיר כולל את כל המיסים והחשבונות. וויפי תקין. הבניין בשדרות רוטשילד סמוך ל'הבימה'.Quiet airy self-contained studio apartment, on first floor of traditional residential building with elevator. Located a stone's throw away from Habima square, at the top end of the beautiful tree -lined Rothschild Boulevard, in the “Heart of Tel Aviv” area of the city!The spaceThe studio also contains a purified boiling and ice cold water dispenser.Coffee shops restaurants and bars are right on the door step and a wonderful bakery plus good food shopping within a two to three minute walk. It is within walking distance of most of the major Tel Aviv attractions and the beach.-Please do read the 'other things to note' section.Guest access- We are happy to arrange Airport Pickup Service:The airport pickup service is available for up to 4 people at a total cost of 180 shekels, (and up to 6 people at a total cost of 250 shekels)The price of this service is commission free, and matches the price you would be offered by local taxi drivers in the airport.If you would like to take advantage of the airport pickup service, please advise us of your:Flight numberLanding dayLanding timeCell phone numberWe will confirm that the service has been booked.

reviews.comments: Great studio apartment in the heart if Tel-Aviv. Communicative host, addresses an issue quickly and effectively. Will definitely go back.
Best location in Tel Aviv, and best value for money! The apartment is super clean, the owner is very responsive and accommodating, and overall a great experience. Will definitely come back again.

I have stayed in many AirBnBs before, including in Tel Aviv, and this was by far the worst experience I had. overpriced space, owned by a person who couldn't care less about hosting. The place was dirty when we arrived, and when I complained the "host" he said: "seems like you are not pleased. Would you like to leave and get a refund?". Finding a spot in Tel Aviv is hard, how detached from reality one has to be to offer that to their paying customers?. I put host in quotation marks because this guy does not care about hosting, not in the standard I know from airbnb anyway. The best and only good part about the unit is the filtered water. Though the filter itself is so dirty and moldy it seems unsanitary.
Don't waste your money here. This place is not worth your money. It is completely overpriced and unmainatined. The AC drips, the shower is gross and dirty, the towels were not clean (thankfully my mother lives in the area so she gave me towels). The only reason I stayed was because I didnt want to waste my trip on searching for new accommodation options and being on the phone with AirBnB.
It's small, but very nice and homey

Yoav's place is great! Excellent, central location in the city and the apartment itself was clean and quiet with a comfortable bed, plenty of heat and hot water and relevant amenities. Yoav was very responsive to my messages and the checkin and checkout experience was smooth as well.
I stayed with my wife for a week and we really liked the studio. It was clean, easy check-in and check-out. The location was great!
Cozy apartment at a great location. Recommended!
Centrally located in the heart of Tel-Aviv yet quiet. This is a great studio for a single business traveler.
Host is a real professional, check in was easy and location is second to none

A great small apt in a very lovely location. Near the music and theatre center. Lovely eating places , great coffee houses all around , seeing people walking with their dogs , feeling comfortable wearing what they want , just a joy to watch them . Yoav is a great host and when the remote control needed to be changed he took care of it.i hope to be back at Yoav’s place again
Thank you Yoav
Oh ,I just will need a little more light and a shower mat for my next stay .

Travelled for business and stayed at Yoav's. Great location and very functional apartment.  I would recommend for solo or business travelers looking for central location with easy access to all of Tel Aviv. Overall a good value.
A great simple place near the action on Rothschild.
Be aware there is a 50 Euro cleaning fee assessed after check in

Good clean place, very central location. No laundry, but there's a laundromat about 10 minutes away. Perfect for any stay if you don't need too many amenities but want a great location in the heart of Tel Aviv.

The highlights for me in this cute space were the air conditioner (felt amazing as we were there the first week of June when it was really hot), water boiler (might not matter to whoever is reading this, but I drink tea everywhere I go so this I loved), and the location. You can easily walk to lots of places without having to call a taxi.

One thing to note about this space is that you have to sweep the water in the shower (there's a squeegee looking mop provided) to the drain once you are done since it doesn't easily go down, and there is also no electrical plug in the bathroom, so if you need to use a hair dryer, you have to plug in your dryer to the outlet underneath the tv.

Overall I would stay here again if I'm in Tel Aviv.
Quiet, clean building and Best location to go out and party on Rothschild Blvd. Center of city. Small studio, perfect for a budget stay. Great air conditioning.
Very comfortable apartment in the center of town. Would definitely stay here again. Great place!

I had a great stay at Yoav’s apartment. It is located very centrally. It was very clean and just as pictured, a great place for 1-2 people. And Yoav was very helpful with the easy self checkin process, local tips, and help with arranging airport pickup. all and all, a great stay!
Literally, the best location in Tel Aviv. Central to everything. Clean and cute apt. Excellent communication w host.

Yoav was an excellent host. Very responsive and helpful. The flat is located on Rothschild St and very close to Habima Theater - you can't ask for a better location! The flat looks exactly like the photos. I felt right at  home. This is the perfect place for your Tel Aviv adventure.

Great stay here! The place was clean, comfortable and quiet. The building is nice and in a great location. Instructions to get into the apartment were very straightforward and easy, and I didn't have to reach out to Yoav for anything because I had everything I needed already. Definitely recommending this place to friends and planning to stay here again in the future. Thanks for all, Yoav!
Great place!

Very clean and comfortable studio apartment in the very desired area. Plenty cafes , restaurants and clubs around. Very pleasant neighborhood. Very easy communication line with the owner.
Definitely would use it again and recommend this place to others.
Great location! Easy to check in. Clean comfortable place

Yoav’s place was clean, comfortable, and very centrally located.  I walked everywhere (20-30 minutes max), though there was a bus stop right down the block if you are going farther/not a walker, and public bike docks nearby.  The beach is about 20 minutes at the closest point; bars and restaurants as close as 5 minutes.  The “main” going out section of Rothschild Blvd is about 15 minute walking to the other end of the street.   It was really quiet with almost no street noise and no noise from other apartments.  If you have a lot of clothes to hang, or are a couple, maybe ask for some more hangers (I stayed a week and doubled up on a few, but I was there 7 nights and probably overpacked ).  There was only instant coffee and no coffee maker, which I didn't realize, so just something to note if you like your coffee first thing in the morning.  It was nice to have the water dispenser.  There were some problems with the wifi, but Yoav was very responsive and took care of the issues quickly.   I also bought an Israeli sim card with data, so it was less of a problem than it could have been.    He was very quick to reply to any other misc questions that I had. Self check-in and checkout were super easy with no issues.  The one negative is that the bathroom has a bad mildew smell.  It isn’t horrible, but it is unpleasant.  There is no window in the bathroom, so I am not sure how this can be addressed.  Overall, I would definitely recommend.
Great place, right in the middle of everything. The place is exactly as showed in the photos. Host is very responsive, nice and pleasant, and very helpful. Totally recommend!
This is the perfect place for a solo traveler or couple, great location in central Tel Aviv, Yoav was beyond helpful and made the trip seamless. Would highly recommend

Pros: The apartment is very well located right next to the bima and it is a renovated clean studio. The host was very responsive and check in was a breeze.

Cons: We thought that the bed was too small for a couple (in length and in width) and there weren't enough pillows. Also there was no shampoo. The shower and the toilet are next to each other, which causes the shower to spray water on the toilet area. The bathroom also has a bad smell.
reviews.response:
Thank you Asaf for your review.
I'm surprised to realize, you had things missing or needed during your stay, which you didn't share with me, although i asked you every several days how have you been.
I would have happily supply extra pillows and shampoo, on the spot.
I'm happy at least I had the chance to at offer late Check-out free of charge, and send you on your way, with a smile.
Hope to have the opportunity to see you again in Tel Aviv :)
Best,
Yoav

reviews.comments: good value, great location.
Enjoyable stay, great location, nice studio!
Yoav’s place is great! I stayed for a week and was satisfied with pretty much everything. Yoav was very responsive and made sure I’ll enjoy my staying.
Good apartment in the center of Tel Aviv. Really close to everything.
A simple flat in an excellent location, excellent value. Very clean and pleasant. Very nice and helpful host. Ask the host about cooking options, they are limited.

Yoav was a great host, he responds quickly to messages and was always helpful with everything we needed. The apartment was clean and easy to get to and from places around the city (great location), will definitely recommend!
This place is in a great position on Rothschild boulevard, very clean, comfy bed, close to bus stop, walking distance to loads of shops, cafes and malls
good stay

We had a great time in Tel Aviv, Yoavs apartment is a spacious 1 room apartment, perfect for a couple. The location on the upper end of Rothschild Boulevard is very central and you have everything in the close neighborhood and you can easily explore the city with the scooter.
Rothschild boulevard can be busy during the day, but generally there is few traffic at night.
Yoav was very helpful, when our luggage didn't arrive and helped us solve the problem.

Yoav was a great host, communication was fast and always helpful. We could even leave our luggage in a place he provided. The apartment was located very well, close to Habima Square. The only downsides were a not so nice shower cabin, and the moist smell some others already have mentioned. Overall a very good value for money.
Clean, very well located apartment! Yoav was responding fast and very accommodating.
Very good location.

Actually, one of my best airbnb experiences. Great value for money. The room was excellent. The location is great and Yoav was really helpful and friendly. Check in and check out was very convenient and easy,  Yoav let us to check in earlier and check out later. We'd love to stay more.

Great location, clean and tidy apartment. However, the lighting in the apartment is too weak. I’d recommend the place solely if you want to only sleep in the apartment and spend most of your time outside in the city.
thanks

We had an amazing time staying at Yoav's place. The location of the apartment is perfect, close to everything like the beach and shopping opportunities as well as restaurants and bars. Yoav was super helpful and always available for us. The place is very clean and in a really good neighborhood.

Yoav is a friendly host and responds quickly to questions. He made early check-in and transport to the airport on early Saturday morning possible, for which we were very thankful. The apartment is very clean and well equipped. The location at Rothschild Boulevard near Habima Square is just great. Highly recommended!

We spent 3 nights at Yoavs place in rothschild boulevard. The Check in and check out was very well organised. The appartment clean and well furnished for a short trip. The area nearby has a lot of bars and cafes (and scooters). We had no problems at all during the stay concerning the appartment.
Great apartment. Perfect localization

Great apartment with a super location. Highly recommended !. Yoav was super helpful and communicating with him was super easy and efficient. The apartment is well equipped and super comfy would definitely return.
Good host, well kept studio, and good service/check in, but ultimately very noisy next to Rothschild Boulevard.

Holiday apartment with a great location, in the heart of Tel Aviv.
During our stay, it was noisy at night (sound of cars on the road).
We really enjoyed the easy check in/out processes.

The location of the apartment is amazing. In the heart of a very cultural and established part of Tel Aviv. Apartment was super clean and nice. Loved the experience. Check in and check out very smooth. I would go back again. Host was very responsive and professional.  Thank you.

Perfect match of description and the real thing. So read the description and you know, what you'll get. Top location in Tel Aviv with the beach, best restaurants, nice cafes closeby. I received the check-in information some days before arrival and everything functioned smoothly.
Such a nice studio at the best location en TLV
I would definitely recommend this place, perfect place to stay if you want to see all areas of TLV. Very clean, air con was great and lovely shower/wet room :)
A nice (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was very professional. Unfortunately, there is no way of cooking and no washing machine, in that case it would have been almost perfect.
Perfect location in the cultural centre of TlV. Walking distance to all major sites.
Yoav's place was great. Clean and ideally located.
Great location, clean apartment, and a good bed to sleep on!
I had a very pleasant stay. The apartment is clean and modern. It is in a good location, which feels very safe and is close to many bars and restaurants.

Yoav's Place is very clean and stylish and most comfortable to stay at. It is very central but quiet although it is on Rothschild Boulevard. Yoav was most helpful and friendly and I would recommend it most highly. It's very close to excellent cafes, Lachmanina and the Tachtit to mention a couple. I will definitely be back!
The apartment is in an excellent location and clean with all the basic amenities. Communication was fast and checking-in was hassle free. Highly recommend.
Everything was perfect! Nice clean place. I love the big trees in front of the house and the good vibes in the neighbourhood.
We loved Yoav’s Place because of the location. The apartment and the area around it made us feel at home right away! Highly recommended!
Great location and value for money if you are looking for a central but calm place from explore Tel Aviv. Yoav was super reactive in his communication.
Very central on the lively boulevard with lots of amenities close by. I would return for sure

The apartment had a great location close to almost everything you need. A lot of restaurants close by on the main road. The apartment was bigger than it looked at the pictures and was nice and clean. Towles was provided and you also could have drinking water from a water distiller. Yoav was very friendly and answered quickly on our messages. We were satying in the apartment for 5 nights.
Great studio, great location, great host. When back to Tel Aviv, I want to repeat everything for sure!

It is great apartment in wonderful location. We could walk by foot everywhere we wanted.
It is close to a wide range of restaurants, cafes and bars, bur is situated in quite area.
The room was exactly like in photos, great for a couple or two friends.
Thank you very much.
Great location and superb communication, thanks a lot Yoav!

Amazing location! Right by Habima Square and lots of things within walking distance - the beach was only 20 minutes walk away.
Yoav was quick to respond with any requests or queries which was great. We had a late flight and Yoav helped with a place to leave our bags that day which was greatly appreciated.
The studio was big enough for the two of us, with a fridge, microwave and water machine. We needed the iron and hairdryer a few times so they were really useful to have.
There was only one night when we heard any noise from outside, but there was something happening on the street and Habima Square so it was to be expected - but we still managed to sleep!

Thank you so much Yoav for creating such a lovely place to share, and for keeping in touch to make sure everything was ok. The location was absolutely superb. What a bonus. I will definitely be back with my husband Raphael. Janette

This accommodation was perfect for us. Clean, tidy, spacious and the location was great.  The self check in was very easy. The flat itself was very quiet, even though it was located in one of the busiest avenues for nightlife. Most bars and restaurants were 5-20 mins away (depending on what you are looking for) and the famous Carmel market was less than 25mins walk.  Yoav was a great host, he gave us some great recommendations and even allowed us check out later during the day as our flight was very late in the evening.   Thank you for a very pleasant stay!

Yoav is a super friendly and professional host, everything with check in and airport pick up worked out perfectly as he told us! The apartment is as beautiful as it appears in the pics, very clean and cozy and perfectly equipped with hairdryer, iron and everything you could ask for. The location is more than amazing, walking distance to all the cool spots in TLV. Thank you, we will be back for sure!!

Yoav's studio is located in the city center, at walking distance from all the nice cafés, restaurants, shops and the beach. The studio is very clean and contains everything you need for a comfortable stay, the airconditioning is a must and works perfectly. The communication between Yoav and I went very smoothly and his responses were always quick, friendly and helpful. The airport pick-up service they offer with friendly driver Ami was also great. Nothing bad to say about this AirBnB!

The apartment is perfect : amazing location in one of the best area of Tel Aviv : central, a lot of good restaurants, coffee shops and bars. The apartment is quite, beautiful and very clean. The communication with Yoav was very easy, and he accepts to adapt the check-in and check-out times which was very helpful for us. One of the best apartment i had the chance to visit in Tel aviv for that price. Perfect for one le two people.
Great location! Close to everything, fun area. Yoav was super helpful and communicative. The studio is clean and well maintained. We had a great time!

First of all, the location is 10/10 - literally everything worth seeing in Tel Aviv is right outside the door (or within a 3min walk) - cannot get any better than this!

Second, the flat was spotless, beautifully designed, equipped with everything you might possibly need. The bed is comfortable, the bathroom works well, the kitchen has all the necessary utensils and more, an iron, towels, bedding etc. Air conditioning works well (much needed in July!).

We stayed for a week, eating breakfast in and the rest of the meals out, I genuinely cannot find one thing wrong and the price/location/quality ratio was unparalleled! Strongly recommend.

This apartment is just great. It's a well-designed studio with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Yoav, the host is super accomdating. The location is amazing. This is the center of the center - walking distance from everything and of course literally on the gorgeous Rothschild boulevard surrounded by the famous Bauhaus buildings.

It's the second time we use Yoav's apartment and we're very  satisfied. Yoav helped us and was available to any question we had. Great singulare apartment which we used for a business guest but would also recommend it for vacations as it's located in one of the best areas in Tel-Aviv.

this is a great place if you're after basic and clean. The only negatives were that there was no shower curtain which problem as the shower is beside the toilet which is very inconvenient. You need to wipe down the floor and the toilet after showering. The wifi had issues and also i found the bed to be extremely uncomfortable. But overall the place is great for everything you need, location/convenience/cleaniliness.

It was my first visit to Tel Aviv and I wanna say, that appartment really nice and have perfect location. U can walk everywhere by walk and it takes your time. A lot of restaurants around, gardens and it only 20 min to the sea. What about Yoav, he is very nice guy who can help you at any time.

The place is great! In a nice and quiet neighbourhood,  The flat is equipped with everything you need. Yoav is fast in answering questions and gives all information you might need. I really enjoyed staying there!
This place is awesome for businesses trip. Enjoy every minute out of the street location with the lovely neighbors and amazing night places. People are very kind, helpful and very friendly. Regards
Cute little apartment in an ideal location. Perfect for two!
Excellent location, warm welcome and great hospitality. Very responsive and friendly host. Thanks Yoav!
Yoav was a great host. Very nice and helpful. The studio is well designed and maintained and the location is superb! Over all a great and recomended experience. Thanks Yoav and see you next time!

We stayed for at the apartment on Rothschild: it exceeded all our expectations. The position, the apartment and the service were some of the best we have encountered in several years of travelling and staying in serviced apartments. High recommended!
reviews.response: Thank you for your kind review, much appreciated! Yoav

reviews.comments:
חווית אירוח נעימה
דירת סטודיו די מרווחת ויפה במיקום מצויין
Self check in מאוד נח
ממליץ
המיקום של הדירה מעולה וקרוב להכל. קטנה אבל מספיקה לאדם/זוג

המארח מדהים, דירה נקיה וקרובה להכל
מומלץ מאוד
תודה על אירוח נפלא
Нет кухонной плиты, очень неудобно если оставаться на несколько дней.

Pas de possibilité de cuisiner,sinon top
Bien placé sur Rothschild à côté de habima

Wir waren zu 2. für 7 Nächte in Yoavs Apartment. Leider wurden uns die Schlüssel in der ersten Nacht nicht, wie versprochen, bei Ankuft überreicht und Yoav war auch nicht zu erreichen. Wir mussten Nachts mit schweren Koffern durch Tel Aviv und noch ins Hotel einchecken. Am nächsten Morgen hatte Yoav zum Glück sein Handy eingeschaltet und wir konnten endlich in die Unterkunft. Uns wurden die Kosten für die erste Nacht zurückerstattet (wir haben ca. 30€ durch die Hotelübernachtung verloren).
Das Apartment war sehr sauber, zentral und befindet sich am ruhigen Ende des Rothschild Blvds. Für 1-2 Personen perfekt. Trotz der ersten anstrengenden Nacht, hatten wir einen tollen Urlaub in Tel Aviv und haben uns in Yoavs Apartment super wohl gefühlt!
Appartement agréable et très bien situé.
Perfetto, appartamento pulito e centralissimo, ottimo rapporto prezzo/qualità, ospite impeccabile, consigliato!

Hi,
We zijn bij Yoav geweest om in Israel een familiebezoek af te leggen en om een indruk te krijgen van Tel Aviv en van het land. Tel Aviv is daarbij een goede uitvalsbasis en het appartement van Yoav is zeer de moeite waard.
Het is schoon en heeft goede, en werkende voorzieningen. In werkelijkheid is er wat meer ruimte dan de foto's doen vermoeden. Rustig gelegen. Leuke horeca voorzieningen heel dichtbij.
Kortom: wil je naar Israel dan is deze betaalbare voorziening een echte aanrader.

Perfecte studio op een perfecte locatie in Tel Aviv. Verblijf is prima voor 1 of 2 personen. Studio was schoon en had alle basisbenodigdheden. Goede prijs/kwaliteit verhouding.
De locatie is zeer centraal, op Rothschild blvd zelf kan je op verschillende plekken heerlijk op bankjes of ligstoelen een boek lezen of wandelen.
Kortom een aanrader om naar toe te gaan!
Las recomendaciones locales las mejores

Студия не большая, но комфортная для непродолжительного пребывания. Находится в конце (начале) Ротшильд и если свернуть на Бограшов, то окажешься у моря. Студия оборудована всем необходимым,: посуда, столовые приборы, холодильник, микроволновка, двуспальная кровать, ТВ с русскоязычными каналами. Отдельное спасибо хозяину апартаментов за гостеприимство и помощь в решении мелких проблем.

Квартира чистая,достаточно уютная. Мы снимали квартиру в феврале и было прохладно вечерами, но был кондиционер,который включали на тепло и было достаточно комфортно. Все для проживания в квартире есть, хозяина даже не видели ни разу, общались только через сайт,что нас вполне устраивало.Мнение о хозяине сложилось очень положительное, он отвечал на все вопросы, организовал нам трансфер из аэропорта, вышло дешевле,чем в официально такси. Квартира находится в самом центре города до моря минут 15 ходьбы, но так как мы отдыхали в прохладное время оно нас мало интересовало. Все понравилось, если кто-то из друзей поедет в Израиль будем рекомендовать эту квартиру.

Le quartier est super, et l'emplacement idéal. Lev Ha Ir, vraiment le coeur de la ville que l'on sent battre. Et quelle ville ! Accueil discret et sympa. Efficace. Logement agréable, propre et confortable. Bel immeuble. Relativement calme. Prévoir une solution parking si vous avez une voiture. Le mieux, c'est de ne pas avoir de voiture à TLV, inutile en pratique.

name: דירה חדשה יפה ומעוצבת  במרכז תל אביב בבניין מפואר
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Beach access - Guests can enjoy a nearby beach
Elevator - The home or building has an elevator that’s at least 52 inches deep and a doorway at least 32 inches wide.
Single level home - No stairs in home
Pets allowed - Assistance animals are always allowed

description: Brand new 2 bedrooms appartement in a brand new building with balcony and parking.Located 2 minutes from the beach you will enjoy the beautiful balcony with a sea view.The kitchen is fully equipped.The spaceThe Luxury apartment is situated at the best location in Tel Aviv, next to the beach(less than a minute walk), the famous Hakarmel Market, Alenbi street and the amazing and historic district of Neve Zedek.This is a charming, fully furnished and equipped sea side apartment. New Building front the Beach next the Royal Beach Hotel.Apartment freshly decorated with 2 bedrooms There is a fantastic sea view. The Kitchen is full equipped. There is a Lobby with a security 24/7. You will get a private parking. Good TV and WIFI. AC works perfectly. Washing machine & dryer.
interaction: There is a lobby guard 24/7. The access is very easy. There is a lift into the building . You can access to the apartment with a mechanical code . It will be provided before the arrival. You can get in by yourself all the time 24/7.

reviews.comments: This was an excellent location very reasonable price and the host was great!!

Modern place in new building next to the beach and close to many interesting spots in Tel Aviv. Apartment was very clean and comes with everything needed for either short term or long terms stays. Would stay again.
Wonderful location
David’s apartment was nice, clean and in the  perfect Tel Aviv location!  We would absolutely stay there again and had a great time.
Wonderful modern apartment in a great location. Very clean and new. Host communication was outstanding. I recommend with no hesitation!
The location is excellent, convenient to the beach and quite secure. The available free parking underneath was a nice bonus for us, as we had a rental car during our stay.

The location is great, just two minutes from the beach. There is a corner store across the street and a restaurant two blocks away. The building has a guard at the lobby which feels very safe. The place is new and clean. We really had a good time. Highly recommended.

We absolutely loved it! It’s a cross the beach and it was so nice to walk every where instead of driving! All though the private parking so convenient. David was available for all our needs and quick response! We enjoy the place a lot! Will Definitely coming back  !
Awesome location - at the beach and very close to city center. We enjoyed it a lot, would always come again!!

It was a pleasure staying in David’s home.
It is a very nice apartment , well decorated and in a nice area .. few steps from the beach.
David is a perfect host and he was kind to organize everything for my stay
Very good!!
It was great, thank you very much

It was a really nice stay in a lovely apartment. Perfect location and David was a really friendly host. The Apartment was clean, modern & beautiful. I would love to come back in the future & I would highly recommend this apartment.

Stayed at David's place with a family of 5, including a 9 month baby. The apartment is clean, nicely furnished and super conveniently located. Hardwood floors and heating were a nice feature in January when the nights are chilly. The sea is just around the corner. There is a 24-hour supermarket right across the street. Carmel market is a couple of minutes by foot. Would definitely recommend this place!

I was at David’s place the second time. Awesome place and neighborhood. Perfect for starting exploring Tel Aviv and just 2 minutes from the beach.
Nice modern building and great apartment. I come back for sure. Thanks.

Our stay was awesome! Clean, cozy apartment, wonderful location, friendly host. There was everything we needed including dishwasher and wash machine there. Beach is right near the building. Super! Thank you.

First of all is the apartment in the most best area and location of TLV. The beach is just over the street and a great spot to explore the city. Very modern, clean and equip with everything what needed. Like a second home. We had a great stay and sure will come back. Christian
Great!

My wife and our two kids (3 and 5 years) stayed 5 nights in the apartment. It was great. Perfect location. Close to the beach, restaurants, bars, playground. The apartment is spacious enough for the kids to play and everything is available. I would definitely recommend it.

We arrived at night and the Check-in was so simple! The parking lot in the city centre on the beach was really Great! The location could not be better: direct on the beach (Banana, Jerusalem, what you want), walking distance to the HaCaramel, Rothschild Boulevard, Neve Tsedek, old Jaffa, etc. The appartment is very clean and comfortable. David is an amazing host! We are coming back, definitely!

This apartment is so beautiful , it’s the best location of Tel Aviv , 1 min from the beach , very design , fully equipped , very nice building with parking , awesome terrrace where my family and me were able to take breafeast with an beautiful see view , Yohan was just amazing with us , thanks for everything .

Bonne disponibilité, réponses rapides à nos questions.
Appartement bien équipé.

El departamento es muy lindo, muy cómodo, y está muy bien ubicado.
Tiene algunos problemas de mantenimiento, que para un departamento de esa calidad son muy molestos. . David conocía algunas de estas fallas (ventana del cuarto que no cierra, persianas del living que no bajan...), por lo que es una pena que no las arregle.

reviews.comments: Amazing location. Apartment has wonderful charm and character. We are looking forward to staying here again.
Palina’s place is amazing. Great neighborhood and super clean. Very nicely decorated. Smooth check in with key in a lock box. Great air conditioning as well.
A nice place all around and a good value.
Beautiful apartment. Very special.
Cool spot. Great location. Minimal amenities.
Great place in amazing location
Excellent location!
Palina’s place in Tel Aviv is amazing and in such a wonderful location! Thank you again for hosting me!
Good spot to stay. Within walking distance of great restaurants and nightlife

Palina’s apartment is a great value in expensive Tel Aviv.  It is a stylish place in the heart of the charming neighborhood of Névé Tzedek, with the sea a few blocks away, and walkable to Old Jaffa and Rothschild Blvd.  The building is quiet in general (the bedroom window is on the floor above where the security gate buzzes open, but we just kept the window closed and used the a/c at night and it did not bother us at all.). The bathroom is located up a short set of stairs from the main living area, which gave the layout a unique feel.  If you are looking for a cute, stylish place in a great location, Palina’s place is it - we would definitely stay here again.

Palina’s place location is excellent! Couldn’t be better! The apartment is the perfect size, it was clean, cozy, comfortable, had great amenities that make life easier when you arrive. We could live there. It is very easy and fast to communicate with her, she is indeed a super host! We highly recommend Palina’s place! Thanks again Palina!

Palina’s Place is beautiful, well located, and well appointed. I really appreciated the fruit and cookies and the beach towels! The shower was also amazing (nice to have a good shower after walking around all day!)  the apartment is a pleasant, 10 ish min walk to the beach through the charming Neve Tzedek neighborhood. Also plenty of bars and restaurants in close walking distance. Apartment is in a quiet street, so no noise troubles.

Palina’s place was perfect!  It was in a great location and within walking distance to many restaurants and bars. The house was spacious and decorated really nicely.  The air-conditioner worked great and we were comfortable for our entire stay.  I will stay here again if I ever come back to Tel Aviv.

This place is absolutely gorgeous, in my favorite area of Tel Aviv and my only regret is that we were not able to stay there for longer. The furnishing is so beautiful and every detail is inspiring. I was giving up on finding a nice place to stay in Tel Aviv, but this rises sooo high above everything else I found - and trust me, I spent hours searching!! You would be lucky to stay here!! Our host was gracious and communicative and wonderful. I don't have enough good things to say about this place. Its a dream!
Five stars across the board. Palina’s place is exactly as described. We decorated, comfortable and perfectly located near shops and restaurants. Palina was also an excellent and accommodating host.

Palina’s apartment is fantastic. We needed to book it last minute, and Paulina was quick to respond and we were able to drop off luggage and enjoy the city right away. It’s in a great location. We walked to the beach and there are several shops, cafes, restaurants and markets to choose from. The apartment itself is quiet and beautiful, with plenty of space for our family of four. The bathroom is gorgeous and we had plenty of hot water. I would love to stay here again!
Great little place in an exceptionally great location on doorstep of the coolest areas of Tel Aviv.

Adorable place, close to everything. We have kids (ages 10 and 7) and felt right at home in Palina's place. She is quick to answer questions and even went to the extra effort of purchasing a US to Israel electric outlet converter. Awesome experience!!
Very nice apartment in an outstanding location.  Highly recommended.
Very stylish. Great location. Clean and spacious. We really enjoyed our stay and highly recommend it. It was really nice to find fresh apples and coffee.

What a beautiful place in a perfect location. The apartment was very stylishly decorated. And a short walk (2 blocks) to a lovely street with many restaurants, cafes, and art galleries. Communication was excellent and very responsive.

Exceeded expectations. Amazing location next to tons of restaurants and coffee shops. Apartment was even nicer than in the photos, and Palina was incredibly responsive. The bed was comfortable, and there were plenty of extra pillows, towels, etc.... Would 100% stay again.

The location is fantastic and while there is a comfortable bed and hot shower, the amount of noise makes sleeping difficult.  If you are not out all night (as many are in Tel Aviv) I would recommend a place that is not under the airplane route and does not have a gate that slams often.
Gorgeous, comfortable apartment in a gorgeous neighborhood that’s close to so much! Checking in was very simple, and Palina was very accommodating.
Paulina’s place was beautiful! Excellent location - walking distance to restaurants, shops and gelato place. :) Very clean place and communication with Paulina was excellent.

Where do I begin! We had such an amazing stay at Palina's place. The location is amazing, just steps away from Herzl, Rothschild, and Shabazi, close to Jaffa and the beach. Palina was available when we needed her and the place was even better than the pictures. When we arrived we had those great little coffee cookies, Nespresso pods and apples waiting for us! If you are deciding between Palina's place and another airbnb, do yourself a favor and go ahead and book with Palina!
Must stay!!!! Paulina was wonderful and her home made Tel Aviv an experience of a lifetime. Incredible location.
Xcellent location clean good beds very good place to stay in TA if we come back we will certainly try to use again!
great location, great price and Palina is very accommodating!
Location! Location! Heart of TLV !Great place! ! Highly recommended !!!

This was a great apartment in a great location. I was unfortunately sick for the first couple of days and spent a lot of time indoors. The apartment was cozy and cool and close by pharmacy and supermarket. When I felt better we walked to the beach and most of the sites nearby. We greatly appreciated that Palina immediately responded to any questions. The apartment was decorated beautifully and we really couldn't have asked for anything else. We would recommend this to anyone who asked.

Thank you so much Palina.
Great place. Very clean and good location.

Palina’s apartment is charming. It is comfortable and set up with a relaxing vibe. Although we missed our flight and were only able to stay for a short amount of time, we did notice that it is centrally located. Not too far from the airport and several options nearby to grab a bite to eat. I am looking forward to going back to Tel Aviv and booking our stay at Palina’s.
It is my second time at the apartment which is quite comfortable and conveniently located. I hope to return soon.

Wow!   Fantastic Airbnb that was close to everything.  Beautiful interior and everything you need to feel right at home.  Palina was a great host and definitely experienced at hosting... I would definitely stay here again!!
This was a cute, clean, great place in a an amazing part of town. Palina was helpful and responsive. I would stay here again!
Wonderful apartment in Neve Tsedek. Palina was very accommodating and very quick to respond. Highly recommended.

Wonderful well appointed apartment one block from Rothschild. Very comfortable with a nice bed and kitchen. Close to all the major bus routes and within walking distance of a shuk. Restaurents, a pharmacy and a grocery store all very close by. We hope to stay here again on our next trip to Tel Aviv.

We immediately felt at home in Paulina’s impeccably clean and centrally located apartment. Neve Tzedek is very walkable and full of shops, restaurants and bars. The apartment was really spacious for 2 people and the building is quiet. We’d stay here again in a heartbeat!

Palina's place was absolutely fantastic!  Situated perfectly in Neve Tsedek - 2 min walk from Rothschild, 5 minute walk from Shabazi, and a 10 min walk from Florentin.  It had great style, was super clean, and had all the amenities.  We wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Beautiful apartment! Shabby chic - just how i like it! Very central with cafes and bars within minutes of walk. I don't recommend renting a car because parking is extremely difficult.

We loved this location! Central between Jaffa and City Center. Very easy to ride bikes everywhere and you're 10-15 mins bike from Beach. This neighborhood abuts Neve Tzedek which is absolutely charming with great shops and cafes  Great organic store just a few steps from the door, Neroli. Place had plenty of space for 3 women with 2-3 bags each. It was exactly as shown in pix and description. Palina was lovely and very accommodating, even having welcome chocolate chip cookies for us. And meeting us for a quick stroll to show us the local grocery stores and tips on shops and restaurants, including the best ice cream, Anita's. I would absolutely stay in her place again in this neighborhood. We loved it!!
Palina's flat was great! It was near much of Tel Aviv's nightlife, beaches, and a local train station. Palina was also very accommodating and helpful. Overall, it was a great experience.

I stayed for a couple of days in penny's lovely apartment which is located close to Rothschild  in a small quiet street (tons of construction nearby but that is he case in all of tel aviv). Penny met me at arrival and was very kind, even getting me a blender. I am not much of a cook, but if somebody wants to cook, there is a nice kitchen. I recommend the apartment and plan to stay there again soon.

Great place to stay, very close to Rotshiled street and Neve-Zedek quarter.
nice and quite place
Beautiful apartment with vintage vibes. Stellar location, right between magical Neve Tzedek and the bustling center of Rothschild blvd.
Great location , perfect for couples, very quiet yet close to everything...highly recommended.
clean, cool, great location and the kids loved it. 5 stars for me
It was a great stay. The place is spotless. Thank you.

Beautiful, full of light and quiet, even though its located in a central place.
Great apartment in a great place.

We stayed for the third time in Polina’s place in the last couple of years, and as always the experience was superb. The location is really one of the best in Tel Aviv – close to Levinsky market and HaCarmel market, and a 15 walk from the beach. The flat was very clean and had everything that we might need, including some stuff to use for the beach as well. Polina was a super great host, helped us with all of our questions and even helped us to resolve an internet problem very quickly even though the problem was with the internet provider. We will definitely come back to stay in Polina’s flat whenever we’ll be in Tel Aviv.

,Great location great apartment
Palina was very nice and attentive
Great location, wonderful apartment, very clean and very nice design as well, high recommended
Lovely spot, in a quiet and really central spot. It's a pleasant, homey space that we thoroughly enjoyed.

The apartment is beautiful and stylish! The place is spacious and comfortable, and you’ll find there everything that you’ll need.
The location is great, in a very quiet and safe area. The beach is in a few minutes walking, and in generally you can walk to many places from there.
Palina's place is stylish, bright and in an amazing location! I highly recommend it!
Big spacious apartment, sparkling clean + big shower & comfortable bed. Communication with Palina was quick & easy. Recommended :)
Stylish interior, perfect cleanliness and excellent location.

The best apartment I have ever stayed at on Airbnb. The place is super comfortable and clean, the location is amazing and the host is very attentive and helpful. Highly recommended place for travelling alone or as a couple.

My mom and I stayed at Palina’s apartment for one week. It was an amazing stay, the apartment was very clean, cozy, and beautiful. We had everything we needed. The location is great and the neighborhood is lovely. We definitely recommend staying in this apartment.

Palina's place is very well located. It is a 10 min walk from the beach and a 2 min walk from the nightlife. Yet the building is located at a street with discrete movement, which makes it very pleasant. The apartment is well equipped, and the picture agrees to reality. We had a great time, and we thank Palina for her great hospitality.

This apartment is such a lovely place in a wonderful location. We were able to walk everywhere. Palina is the most amazing, gracious host who is easy to communicate with. She has thought of everything in terms of ensuring a comfortable stay. We were traveling at a stressful time for travellers throughout the world, and yet with Palina's thoughtfulness and hospitality we felt at home. We hope to be back one day.

Palina offered a super quick turn around to any any queries and incredibly thoughtful with some of the small touches around the apartment like fresh milk, beach towels and a local guide book!

The location is absolutely fantastic and have already recommended to friends and family as the perfect place to stay!
Fabulous place , very near to Rothschild, had a great time
Lovely apartment. Palina is a very friendly host.

Palina's clean and generous apartment is in the perfect location to explore the city, yet in a quiet and friendly street. I've stayed in it twice, both times for seven days, and couldn't be more satisfied. Her ability to respond quickly makes all the logistics very easy. Whatever time of the year you visit Tel Aviv, I'd highly recommend staying here.

Perfect location, very well equipped, communication very easy and reactive!
Thank you again!!

We had a wonderful stay in this apartment. We slept well in the bed and the sofa, we could cook in the kitchen, everything was there. The neighborhood is also perfect - bars, restaurants are nearby. We felt very save! Palina was also nice and communication was great! Palina made sure that we had a great stay!
Palina's place is super nice, her service is top-notch and her apartment is located exactly where you want to be in Tel Aviv! Highly recommended

excellent location , close to everything .
Nice appartment with a lot of little attentions from Palina .
Really enjoyed our stay. Everything was perfect: flat and location were great! Thanks Palina!

Great host and excellent location. The sofa bed was surprisingly very comfortable

The apartment is as shown in the images and exceeded my expectations. I loved my week stay at Palina’s apartment. The location in Neve Tzedek is fantastic. I loved the bathroom and having laundry facilities. The bed was comfortable and there was plenty of space. The wifi wasn’t great, which was the only downside. However not that big a deal. I would highly recommend staying!
Very clean, beautiful decor and a great location. We enjoyed our stay.

Palina’s place is in the most fantastic location in Tel Aviv and is beautifully decorated. The beds are very comfortable and the apartment has everything you need for a wonderful stay. We absolutely loved our time here and highly recommend to other travellers
perfect!

Super well situated, close to restaurants, shops and nice neighborhoods.The apartment is nice decorated ,very clean and confortable.

Very nice place

Palinas place is wondeful! It is beauyiful and super clean and provided from everyhing! Palina is very easy in checking in and out. Communication went well. perfect location
Great location in trendy neighborhood- but still quiet to sleep - secure location and lots of great amenities close by .
Fantastic location near the main sites of Tel Aviv. A lovely quirky little apartment with everything you need. Nice and easy to check in without stress. Fantastic host. Highly recommended.
I had a wonderful stay at Palina's apartment. It is done up quite tastefully and has a lot of natural light with views of beautiful bougainvillea creepers from all the windows :) Highly recommended!

good apartment
nice location.
Palina, thanks a lot ))

Paulina’s place is amazing. It’s close to lots of cafes, bars, etc but also within easy access of the beach and Jaffa. The place is well equipped and very thoughtfully decorated. We loved our stay and would highly recommend.
Palina's place is incredible and in the best location! She was a great host. Highly recommend!

Really nice Appartement with a lot of well thought through small details. Excellent location in the middle of a very cool neighborhood - so many restaurants, coffees and shops; any stay is just too short!

Great apartment at a great location in Tel Aviv!
Thanks again, Palina!
Excellent experience to stay in the apartment. Close to many places, the Vietnam restaurant close by is very good.
Great location, walking distance to main city sights. The apartment was very clean and cozy, with comfortable beds. The host was nice and responded very quick. Thank you, Palina!
Feels like home. Perfekt place to explore Tel Aviv. Great support by the host whenever needed. We will return for sure !
Palina’s place was perfect. Exactly what we needed for a quick romantic getaway in Tel Aviv.

Palina's Place is in a great location, on the edge of Neve Tzdek close to a health food shop and also near Rothchild and Shuk Ha Carmel. It is relatively quiet. The bed is comfy and there are plenty of towels, soap, and some amenities like coffee and milk for the morning. Palina was super quick and helpful to answer when I called her about the wifi info which was on the fridge. Thank you for a lovely stay!
All the best, Nirupa
Nice at Palina’s. Location is amazing, just footstep away from some of the coolest restaurants of Tel Aviv.
The space is amazing, good location, and all was good on my standing
My finest recommendations to Paulinas place. Location is ideal, professional communication!
a perfect place to stay in Tel-Aviv for 2: central but quiet, clean and well equipped. the communication was very friendly and uncomplicated.

Perfect location
Cozy apartment

Well Paulina’s place is every thing you wanted

Palina was a terrific host and her apartment is not only a joy to stay in with its clean, inviting atmosphere and generous space, but also located in a mellow corner of the city’s most vibrant and enjoyable neighborhoods. We stayed for one week and can find many reasons to stay in this apartment when we visit Tel Aviv again. Needless to say, we thoroughly recommend it to anyone who wants to visit and explore this amazing city.

Palina's flat is superbly located between Rothschild and Florentin, and only a few minutes walk from the beach. The stylish interior features special touches, such as antique furniture renovated with modern finishes. Palina was kindly flexible with our early check-in, and responded quickly to all messages. Thank you! :)
Beautiful place in great location!

We enjoyed our time at Palina‘s apartment very much. It was the perfect spot to discover Tel Aviv with our two kids. The apartment has everything you need and enough space for a family of four. It is closed to nice restaurants, cafes and a supermarket and the beach is in walking distance - which was essential for our boys...

The communication with Palina was quick and easy. We would definitely recommend to stay at Palina‘s place and will come back when returning to Tel Aviv.
We have enjoyed Palina's apartment very much! It was perfect for our stay in Israel and Tel Aviv in particular.

Palina’s place is just as beautiful as in the pictures. It was sparkling clean, very well located (Neve Tzedek is a very beautiful, photogenic area) & Palina was very responsive. We were able to walk everywhere - heaps of great restaurants nearby, a 2-3 minute walk to Rothschild Boulevard, not too far from the beach or the bustling Carmel Market.

It’s like the pictures. Spacious, nice decoration, good bed, airconditioned bedroom, super location in Neve Tsedek, walking distance to the beach, Jaffo, Carmel Market, Rotschild blvd. Supermarket around the corner. Will come back.
We've enyojed our stay at Palina's place very much! good location. highly recommendable.
Palina's place is truly amazing in every aspect. The flat is clean and beautiful, the location is great and Palina was extremely helpful. Highly recommended!
Excellent place, great location, very stylish, perfect for 3 people, spacious, clean and fresh.
We had a more than wonderful stay in Palina's apartement. The location is great!

I stayed at Palina's place with 2 friends and we absolutely loved it..massive blues when we had to leave the place and Tel Aviv! Palina is super nice and communication has always been swift and helpful. Self chek-in was super smooth and the flat is exactly as you see it in the pictures..actually even better! It is bigger than I thought and decorated tastefully throughout..all amenities are new and the place is spotless. Comfy bed and sofa bed, great airco (much needed hehe) and clean bathroom with a great shower. Kitchen has got also everything you need and we find it handy in the morning for breakfast. Location couldn't be better..you are 5 mins away from the beach and literally just behind Rothschild with plenty of bars, cute cafes and restaurants around. Honestly the best location in Neve Tzedek! I couldn't recommend this place more and Palina for her kindness! Thank you! I am really jealous of the next guests.. you'll have a great stay :)

Its wonderful appartement, Perfect location
All was perfect !!!! Thanks a lot Palina !!!!

We loved Palina's place. It's clean, very very very (did I say very?) well located, comfy, well equipped, cool. We were 4 (my wife, me and 2 children) and were pretty well accommodated, but it is still more special for a couple.
Our only regret was that Brazil lost the game against Belgium, but I don't think Palina would have been able to change that...
Don't miss the vietnamese restaurant around the corner (Hanoi), is superb. Stroll around Shabazi Street and get an expensive but worthy frozen yogurt at Hanita. If you can avoid it, don't get to Tel Aviv by car, it's very hard to park it. But if you must, then try parking at Shteyn Menahem, 2 blocks away (if you don't find any spot in front of the house).
Palina was a nice host – we lost the key, and she was able to get there and hand me another one in less than 20 minutes.

Very nice, sparkling clean, well equipped apartment.
One air-conditioner wasn't working and as it was Saturday Palina the host couldn't do anything immediately.
She was so fair to offer full refund, and as we manged with the one smaller air-conditioner, we stayed both nights and enjoyed as expected.

We spent very good time in Palina’s apartment. Palina has excellent apartment in the city center of Tel Aviv. We have been there 4 days and we can recomend this place to everyone. The apartment is very nice and very clean. Palina takes care and look after guest.
The place is more wonderful than you can imagine, the pictures do not convey enough of the size of the place and the beauty.

Great apartment in a great location in Tel Aviv. Everything is a short walk away. Turn right and you are on Rothschild st taking you to centre of Tel Aviv, turn left and you have Neve Tsedek filled will great restaurants and coffee shops. Only a short walk to the beach. We really felt at home. The apartment is very cosy.

The outside of the building is misleading - it looks a little run down. But once you are in the apartment, it's perfect. Beautifully, thoughtfully and tastefully decorated, extra touches to make you feel like it's your own home, very clean, brilliant location and right next door to a lovely yoga studio. Two minutes from Rothschild, two streets from Shabazi in Neve Tzedek and Anita's ice-cream :) Highly recommend. Great communication. Perfect host. X

Great apartment, very nicely decorated (shabby-chic style, just as shown in pictures). Place was very clean. Communication with Palina was always very easy and she was very helpful (giving tips on where to eat, helping with organizing a taxi). The place is perfectly located in a side street with easy walking distance to restaurants and shops and the beach. The bed is comfortable, only little downside is that there are no dark window shades so the bedroom cannot be darkened at night to sleep properly. Other than that it was a lovely stay at Palina’s place and and I can recommend it as a good starting point to discover bustling Tel Aviv.

A very stylish, beautiful yet comfortable apartment. Location is superb. We walked everywhere. Communication was perfect: quick, attentive and clear. Anyrhing we needed was quickly and generously given. We appreciated the lightness ans flexibility. It was a wonderful experience, we'll come back.

One thing though - Parking is impossible. We ended paying 220 shekel (!) for our 30 hours of stay, so we don't need to move the car all the time. In hindsight, it would have made sense to park the car outside the heart of the city and use public transportation to get to the flat.
Very nice place. Very well located.
A perfect airbnb in Tel a Viv
Great beautifull place.

Great design, amenities and location. We used uber to get around better that rip off taxis, but insist on meter readings not fixed prices. Even uber drivers tried it on (170 NIS just to Ben Gurian Airport), worse that many cities.

We had a lovely stay! Right next to one of the best areas in Tel Aviv. Our host was very helpful and communicative. The apartment is beautiful and was clean and homey. Was perfect for us, traveling with a 3-year-old.
Definitely recommended!

Palina was so so wonderful and responsive. Her apartment was lovely and very centrally located on Neve Tzedek. Place was clean and had everything we needed! Thanks again, we hope to come back someday.
The best place to stay in Tel Aviv!

Second time in Palina's apartment. Just like last time: The perfect spot for a vacation in Tel Aviv. Very clean, high comfort, just as shown in the pictures. Would recommend it every time to everybody!

We stayed for the weekend for my wife's birthday and had a wonderful time. Clean, comfortable, well-designed and located on the edge of Neve-Tzedek, a few minutes' walk from Rothschild Av., the market and everywhere we needed to go.
Palina was very responsive and everything was ready, with a few surprising amenities like an Espresso machine and even a milk frother.
Thanks Palina,
all was great. Place is authentic and clean. Location couldn't be better
Great place, great stay!

Great place - good location, stylish decor, good warm shower, WIFI worked well, comfy bed, decent cooking facilities. One tiny issue is that the windows are a little thin, so there is some low level noise occasionally, but its not a noisy street, so no big issue, and ear-plugs were more than enough to fix. I'd happily stay again at this place.

We loved Palina's apartment.  The location is the best you can get in TLV, right off of Rothschild street! The apartment is really pretty and we loved the eclectic decor that makes you feel immediately at home. It was super clean with comfy beds, useful kitchen, an amazing shower, and TV with a wide selection of shows. For all of you light sleepers, the apartment does get a lots of sun in the morning. The communication with Palina was easy! Highly recommended!
We had a great time. Loved the interior decorating! The extra touches of fruit, coffee and chocolate were very much appreciated. Will definitely come back.
great place great location!
The place was wonderful, well located and clean. Palina was kind and available for any request we had. over all a 5 star stay in a an amazing part of Tel Aviv.

The apartment is located in small quiet street a neighbourhood with many restaurants, and lot of life, mostly in the evening. It is possible to walk everywhere (beach, bus and trains stations, Jaffa, city centre,...) and it was a great base to explore the country.
Good location. Everything you need for a short stay. Cozy, clean, good wifi, TV, coffee machine. Great communication with the host. Highly recommend this airbnb stay.
Everything about Palina's apartment was perfect, from the location to the little touches inside. It's actually nicer than in the pictures, and Palina was a pleasure to deal with.
Good

We loved staying at Palina’s apartment - it was incredibly perfect for our 6 days in Tel Aviv. The apartment is GORGEOUS, it is perfectly located (right in the middle of all of our favourite areas of the city), and Palina was super helpful, even allowing us to leave our baggage in the apartment after checkout when we had a late flight. We highly, HIGHLY recommend Palina’s apartment!

Amazing place. Perfect location. Very clean and practical.

great flat and great localisation

The apartment is worth its (Website hidden by Airbnb) is very stylish, clean and comfortable. It has  got excellet location ..walking distance to the oldest Telaviw part  outside Jaffa.. The perfect spot for a vacation in Tel Aviv. Very clean, high comfort, just as shown in the picture (which is a big plus at Airbnb!). Would recommend it every time to everybody!

Thank you Palina for our lovely stay at Tel Aviv. The location was ideal and everything was in walking distance. We enjoyed our cool neighoorhood with bars, cafés, cute shops and of course the beach (10min walk). Check-in and out was flexible and communication with our host was so easy. We'd love to come again!

Wahooo! What a find! If that place is free on your dates, go ahead and book it with your eyes closed. Very bright, extremely clean, super well designed with a decoration taking attention to every details with soul and heart that makes it feel very homey as well.  It is located in probably the nicest neighborhood of Tel Aviv next to the beach and to the best Ice Cream Shop in the world (Anita). Palina responds immediately and is easygoing. Cherry on the cake: we were welcomed with a nice bottle of wine and gummy bears. Thank you Palina!
We had a lovely time at the appartment! Well decorated, good vibe in an ideal neighbouhood to explore the city. And a good bed to sleep in. I certainly recommend this place!

The apartment was absolutely gorgeous, even better than pictured on the photos. It's also very clean and light. The flat is greatly located, next to many cafes and restaurants and main street Rothschild Boulevard. The contact with Palina was very good, she was helpful and welcoming. Most definitely recommend!

The apartment looks very much as advertised but was even a bit better than expected. There is a full kitchen and washing machine and everything you need is provided - Nespresso machine with pods, iron, shampoo/conditioner, hair dryer, etc. There were even fruit and cookies upon arrival and cold water in the refrigerator.  Check-in was very easy and it was a pleasure to communicate with Palina.  The location is great - easy walk to the seaside and to Rothschild Street. I highly recommend it.
Great location. Close to the beach, the main area and the main avenue for restaurant and to go out. The communication with Palina was good for the check-in and check out. I recommend it.

The flat is just perfect and in a great location, close to everything and very quiet
I come almost twice a year in tel aviv and this palce is the best i ever find

very nice appartement, clean and well furnished. palina always replied immediately and was very helpful. the only thing that bothered us a bit, was that the bed and the living room werde separated by a paravent rather than an actual wall. otherwise, it is exactly as pictured and discribed.
Awesome location. The apartment is clean and well appointed. Nice comfy bed. Excellent value in this part of tel aviv. Would definitely stay here again.

Palina's place was great. My husband and I stayed here for a long weekend in Tel Aviv. The flat is beautiful and perfectly equipped - lovely hot shower, comfy bed, great little kitchen, and a coffee machine - perfect! The neighbourhood is lovely - in walking distance of great restaurants, bars and cafes and not far from the beach - we walked everywhere. Highly recommended, and would stay here again on my next visit to Tel Aviv.

This is very nice, well designed and cozy apartment. It has very good location: close to the sea, supermarkets, pubs and public transport. We stayed there for a week in January 2017. Palina, the owner, was very polite and responsive.
Simply perfect! Well placed, friendly, professional, clean, cool and good vibes!
Come and visit Tel Aviv and stay in Palina's home, it's really great...She's nice and always available, apartment is great and good located

Квартира очень атмосферная, а месторасположение просто шикарное! Все понравилось. Единственное, хочу предупредить путешественников с маленькими детьми: в квартире много стильных интерьерных деталей, которые легко поломать и разбить, кухонные ящики и шкафы низко. Приходилось постоянно следить! И квартира находится на втором этаже, а лифта нет. Коляску таскать на себе.

Das Appartment liegt mitten im Herzen von Tel Aviv, zahlreiche Bars und Restaurants sind fußläufig zu erreichen, die Entfernung zum Strand beträgt zehn Gehminuten. Ausstattung und Sauberkeit sind super, die Kommunikation mit Palina ist sehr unkompliziert und schnell. Das Appartment eignet sich perfekt für einen Trip nach Tel Aviv.

Alles perjekt :-) Optimale und ruhige Lage nahe am Rothschild Boulevard. Strand ist ebenfalls in 15 min zu Fuss zu erreichen. Viele sehr gute Restaurants in der Gegend, vorallen die "NIGHT KITCHEN" ist sehr zu empfehlen.
Sehr schöne und anspruchsvolle Einrichtung und ein sehr gut Bett.
Alles war super und Palina war sehr nett und hilfsbereit :)

Мы отдыхали семьей с мужем и 1,5 года ребёнком. Апартаменты Палины действительно такие как заявлено на фотографиях: дизайнерская квартира в стиле шебби шик, очень тёплые материалы и фактуры, которые хочется постоянно трогать руками :) Отдельно хочется отметить что в квартире очень тёплая и домашняя энергия, то есть там приятно находиться. Есть всё необходимое для того чтобы почувствовать себя как дома: посуда для готовки (мы даже духовым шкафом пользовались) всё для душа, чистые и свежие полотенца и постельное белье. Также в холодильнике были вода, мятный лимонад и апельсиновый сок. Есть кофемашина с капсулами, сахар и чай. Прекрасное расположение в сердце Тель-Авива, до пляжа 10 минут пешком, рядом есть много магазинов, кафе и ресторанов. В двух минутах ходьбы есть супермаркет, фалафельная, салат и паста бар, а также лучшее мороженое в Израиле, которое хочется есть каждый день :) Палина отзывчивая и очень приятная хозяйка, готовая помочь в любую минуту. Мы определенно вернёмся ещё, нам очень понравилось! Спасибо, Палина! :)

We had a rest a family with husband and 1.5 year's old baby. Apartments Palina really like stated in photographs: Designer apartment in the style Shabby Chic, very warm materials and textures you want to constantly touch:) Separately we note that the apartment is very cozy and home energy, then there are nice. Comes with everything you need to feel at home: cooking utensils (we even used oven) for a shower, clean and fresh towels and bed linen. Also in the refrigerator were water, mint lemonade and orange juice have a coffee machine with capsules, sugar and tea. Excellent location in the heart of Tel Aviv, 10 minutes walk to the beach, nearby there are many shops, cafes and restaurants. Two minutes walking distance there is a supermarket, falafel bar, salad and pasta bar, as well as the best ice cream in Israel who want to eat every day:) Palina responsive and very pleasant hostess, ready to help at any moment we would definitely come back again, we really enjoyed it!
Thanks a lot Palina! :)
