description: A lovely renovated  studio apartment. Very pleasant and tastefully decorated.Enjoy the wonderful location of the apartment - only 150 meters from the beach on one of the city's main streets.Stay close to everything within a short walk, with maximum access to public transport along with the possibility to have a small and pleasant corner due ti the fact the apartment is not facing the main street.This is the most perfect accommodation place in town. Suitable for a couple or an individualThe spaceA studio apartment in prime location - heart of Tel-Aviv by the beach and the main tourist attractions. The apartment has been recently renovated - everything is new, clean and super comfortable. The apartment is cozy, it has ultra fast Wifi, super comfortable bed, new AC, the kitchen has everything you need to cook and there is a great natural light coming from the windows.Guest accessThis is an entire apartment and therefore you would have private access to everything the apartment has to offer.On your arrive day You can enter the apartment at 2:00pm.On your last day we will start the cleaning from 11am ,at the morning.If you need any help with your suitcase, that will not be a problem.Other things to notePlease note that 17% VAT is applicable for any guest not entering the country on a Tourist (B2/B3) VISAParking is available in an additional NIS 50 and must be ordered in advance.Breakfast is served in a Cafe near the apartment and vouchers can be purchased at an additional charge.The apartment is on the ground floor and during the hot summer days there is a slight chance of insects.It is important to note - the apartment is completely sealed and sprayed frequently so the chance is very low.Animals are allowed.
interaction: I will do my best to make sure everything is perfect for your stay,  I am available 24/7 on what'sApp.I would be very happy to assist with any question, consultation or request for help
transit: The easiest way to get around in Tel Aviv is by bicycle. you can easily rent one on an hourly basis (tel-ofan), There's a station right in front of the building and I'll be happy to show you how to use it.The city is a walking city, very easy to get around.All public transportation is near, dozens of buses and shared taxis (Shi-rut). And you will easily observe the high beat of movement and how to get yourself from one place to another

reviews.comments: Amazing spot in the perfect location! Great people and very helpful. Would definitely stay here again next time I’m in the city :)
Not bad. You get what you pay for. It was smaller than expected and the bathroom wasn’t so nice. The shower water took a long time to get hot. Overall it was okay
Great!
Thanks a lot, super effective communication and option for late check-out was clutch.

Great place. Very close to the beach. Right next to a 24/hr "grocery store".

Clean. Fresh towels.

10/10 would rent again

This is a great place for 1-2 people looking for somewhere that is only a couple of minutes away from the beach. The apartment was as described. It is a bit of a long walk if you want to go to Jaffa, but the tayelet/promenade is gorgeous and makes the walk worthwhile. I would definitely stay here again.

Prime location, easy to get in, very save
I would stay again.

Ori’s place is very close to the beach. There’s a convenient store that’s open 24 hours right next to the building, as well as a laundry area across the street. And a lot of good restaurants are also around the neighborhood. I love the place for its convenient location. Also, it’s in a safe neighborhood. The apartment offers everything that I needed to have a comfortable stay in Tel Aviv.
What a great little spot for a short stay! Super central location (and so close to the beach) plus super quick communication by the host makes it a perfect place as you explore Tel Aviv.
Everything was amazing. Perfect, simple, amazing location. The host was very helpful and attentive to whatever I needed.

A simple comfortable place. Great location with shops and restaurants  of any kind, and minutes to the best beaches. While in center of activities, the studio is amazingly quiet (Website hidden by Airbnb) Great value.
Great location fully equipped ! Very pretty and convient!
A perfect place for 1-2 people. Everything is within walking distance from the apartment and it’s right next door to a 24 hr market. Will be staying here again in the future :) !
Great location, very close to the beach.  Apartment appears as advertised in the photos.  Host was responsive and helpful.
thanks!

I thoroughly enjoyed staying in Ori’s studio apartment. Recently renovated, the air conditioning was cold, the property was clean, and bathroom modern.

The location can’t be beat! Walk to the end of the block, turn the corner, and there’s Frishman Beach. It seems to be within walking distance or a short taxi ride to most attractions in the beach areas of Tel Aviv and Jaffa.

Ori is a gracious host, responsive and willing to recommend a good restaurant or help with suggestions for tours!

I utilized the studio as a base from where I toured the country and made my way to Petra and Wadi Rum in Jordan. Always a plus packing for the day and not having to haul around bigger suitcases.

On my next visit to Tel Aviv I’ll definitely stay there again!
reviews.response: Thank you very much Blaine, I was very happy to have you! I wish you all the best and have fun later on your trip :)

reviews.comments: Great apartment in a great location, so many places around which are walking-distance. The apartment was very clean and accurate to the photos. The kitchen was pretty well-equipped. The TV is large and has Netflix, YouTube, Spotify, etc. which was really nice. We had a great time staying here.
Great location, a little small but if you’re just looking for a place to crash it’s good. Clean room and communicative host.
A perfect place to stay. Host was really great. Location doesn't get better than this place - beach, restaurants, bars, etc.
Beautiful place to stay...

Ori's place was great, exactly as pictured and described in the listing. Communication was easy and the self-check in was smooth. The studio room is located in the heart of Tel Aviv, small but comfortable and above all VERY affordable! The room was clean and the bed was very comfy. Great option when staying in Tel Aviv!
Great location and super clean! A lovely stay!
Great place, looks like the pictures and great location
Ground floor, easy check in
The place is Great! Very clean, nice decor touches, comfortable bed, everything you need is there :)) The location is amazing, highly recommended Thank you Ori :)

Perfect place with a perfect host.
Thanks
Very well organised place close to the beach! :)
Great location, everything within walking distance.  Great hospitality.

Great location but very basic equipment. Easy to access and close to the beach. Ground floor very convenient. No windows with outside view.
The host is not visible but super reactive
It’s ok for a few days in this nice city and enjoying the beach. Not for a romantic stay with your partner !

I spent 5 nights at Ori's place at the beginning of November 2019. The place is ideally located and well equipped (TV, AC, ventilator, fridge, microwave, ...) . Communication with Ori was excellent. There might be some marginal room for improvement on light and noise isolation, as well as on the general maintenance of the bathroom's equipments. With this in mind, I would recommend this place to other guests.
reviews.response:
Thank you Pierre for all your feedback!
Happy to hear you had a good experience overall!
we are currently working on improving the bathroom facilities like you mentioned, we are waiting to host you again!

reviews.comments: Quite an okay apartment that was very cheap and next to the beach
Centrally located, compact lock up and go apartment walking distance from the beach. Perfect for one or 2 people who are out and about during their stay. Free WiFi and Netflix is great!

Thank you for hosting me at your studio flat. The flat was great and what I really loved was its location. Central, 2 minutes walk to the beach, bus stop in front of the flat with direct bus (445) to and from Ben Gurion airport, very clean and modern, 24 hour super market right next to the flat, sheer number number of bars, cafes, restaurants and bakeries within very close proximity. What else to ask for! It has everything you need to enjoy the great city of Tel Aviv!

This studio apartment is in a fantastic location. Just a few minutes from the beach.  It was easy to get in, and was just as pictured on air bnb.  Ori was easy to communicate with, and answered calls and emails right away.  Had a great overnight experience.  Thank you.

The cutest place for a couple!!!
Location is so amazing.
Cannot get a better prize quality.

Oh and Ori, is a awesome host!
Nice comfortable apartment right next to the beach, but also close to shops, restaurants etc. Ori is a great host, he’s very responsive and helpful.

Studio apartment in an amazing location - 3 minute walk to the beach. Great air-conditioning and a perfect place to stay if doing a long weekend in Tel Aviv and you need a base to sleep. Would highly recommend, great communication throughout stay.
Nice place!
Great location, clean and well-appointed. Communication was excellent, recommended.
Very nice and homely small space in close proximity to the beach and many shops and restaurants in the area

The studio is pèrfectly located in a trendy part of Tel Aviv close to beach and restos.
However there are 2 factors that might or might not be important for some;
The bed is really uncomfortable and the mattress is super soft!
There is no window at eye level or that can be open so it’s a bit claustrophobic.

But I had a nice stay and was ok for a quick visit.
reviews.response:
Dear Madhu,
I'm very happy to hear that you enjoyed in our apartment :)
As we discussed in our telephone conversation, due to what you said to me, the mattress and the bed were replaced by a new one!
As for the window, it is important to note that the curtain and the window can be opened over the bed with the special hook attached to it.
However, I was happy to host you and I'll be more than happy to host you again in the future !!

Shalom,
Ori

reviews.comments: Would recommend
Ori's place is very well located, close to the beach and restaurants.

Great host, very welcoming, allowed early check in and late check out at last minute. Studio was very clean and just as advertised. Great location, short walk to beach and cafes and bars close by. Great value for money
Quiet cosy studio apartment in perfect location.

We had an absolutely great stay! Omer and Ori are amazing hosts and so switched on! The flat is perfect, clean compact and in an amazing location ... so close to the beach, to busses, to shops, the market or the sights or the night life! Plus it’s quite and such a great value for money too!

I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Tel Aviv/Israel!

Omer & Ori thanks for making our stay in Tel Aviv amazing!

If you are looking for a clean, safe, great value space in Tel Aviv, then this is a perfect choice. So close to everything. I needed a base from which to make my way around Israel. Buses and taxis were literally minutes away, as was the beach. This apartment has everything a single traveller or a couple would need to enjoy their time. I loved the location, though what was also very important for me was that Ori and Omer were not only responsive, but super helpful and answered questions I had. They certainly did everything they could to provide tips when I asked, to help me make the most of my time. A couple of beers left in the apartment to welcome me on arrival were also appreciated and added a nice touch. Thank you, I will be back.

Ori was a great host, his communication was excellent and he was very responsive. The apartment was exactly as described, in a great location near the beach and situated on a main street of Tel Aviv. Despite this, the apartment was actually very quiet. I had everything I needed including air conditioner / fan, TV with cable, fridge and kitchen amenities. It’s a small place but very comfortable. I stayed in Israel for 3 weeks and given all of the reasons above, I considered the accommodation to be really good value for money. I would definitely recommend this place for all of the reasons above and overall, I am very happy I chose to stay there. Thanks Ori!

This apartment is beautiful for couples. The location is perfect for any interests! Beach is close by, Dizengoff is right around the corner, Serona, the shuk and the namal are all a bus ride away. Plus there are loads of 24/7 supermarkets very close by. The apartment itself is cosy and stylish. The aircon is super effective (so good). The hosts are very quick to respond and are quite friendly. The place was cleaned before we arrived and they left us a few presents as well :) The only thing that was slightly off was the lack of cooking utensils and shampoo that would probably be expected. I would highly recommend this place and can't wait to go back there when I travel to Tel Aviv again!

I had an amazing time staying here. You can't beat the location - you can walk to almost anything in Tel Aviv and you are right next to the beach! The inside is exactly as advertised. There is great AC (for when it gets really hot in TA), a full kitchen, large fridge and nice bathroom.

The hosts were also great. They were always available to message and even welcomed me with beers and chocolate. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Très très propre, hôte très réactif, très bon rapport qualité prix.
Je conseille fortement
Excelente ubicación, buen lugar cerca de la playa en un ambiente agradable muchas gracias por la ayuda que me brindaron

Studio avec un emplacement idéal.
Très central, proche tout commerce et transport.
Situation exceptionnelle.
Le studio est conforme à la description.

description: ⭐ A clean and cute quiet little place, PERFECTLY LOCATED at the famous Ben Yehuda Avenue, right above the best cafes, restaurants and bars Tel Aviv can offer.⭐ Renovated from scratch on April 2019⭐ Excellent location at the corner of Ben Yeuda and Bugrashov St ("Tourist's Kingdom")⭐ Supermarkets, shops, ATM  - 1 min walk away⭐ 2 min walk to Jerusalem / Geula beach⭐ 5 mins from Hilton Beach⭐ Super easy SELF CHECK-IN⭐ Shared rooftopThe spaceIncludes: ✔ WiFi  ✔ Queen size bed ✔ Double sofa-bed✔ TV + Netflix✔ AC : Cooling / Heating ✔ Equipped mini-kitchen for basic cooking ✔ Towels (1 per guest), toilet paper, soap, bed linenGuest accessYour own air-conditioned studio apartment completely PRIVATE. The apartment is easily accessed, located on the ground floor and is equipped with everything you may need on your stay.Other things to note✌ The final price refers to guests visiting Israel on a tourist visa (B2/B3/B4). Israeli passport holders, or guests who don't present a copy of their border control pass and passport, will be charged an additional 17% VAT.✌ המחיר המוצג לא כולל מע"מ - בעלי אזרחות ישראלית יתבקשו להוסיף 17% מע"מ בטרם הכניסה לדירה✌ Please note, the year 2021 will be accompanied by a lot of infrastructure work and railway construction in our area so there may be noises and disturbances during your stay, not on weekends. Apologies in advance for the noise.✌ שימו לב, שנת 2021 תלווה בהמון עבודות תשתית ובניית רכבת באזור שלנו ולכן ייתכנו רעשים והפרעות במהלך השהות, לא בסופי שבוע. מתנצלים מראש על הרעש.
additional_house_rules:
חוקי הבית:
רק מוודאים שאנחנו באותו ראש :)
• 24/7 כן. אתם יכולים לבצע צ'ק-אין/אאוט באופן עצמאי 
אם אתם עושים צ'ק-אין לאחר השעה 15:00 וצ'ק-אאוט לפני 10 בבוקר.
• הנחיות מלאות ישלחו יום אחד לפני הגעתכם.
• אנו מכינים את המקום כברירת מחדל בהתאם למספר האורחים המוצג בהזמנה (2 אורחים = 2 מגבות = סט סדינים = מיטה זוגית אחת), ומספקים מגבת אחת לאורח אחד (לשימוש בבית בלבד) לכל הזמן השהות שלכם.
• רעשי עיר אופייניים - רעש פוטנציאלי בין השעות 7-19 (לא כל יום, לא בסופי שבוע).
• זהו בניין תל אביבי ישן טיפוסי.
• אנא כבדו את השכנים ואל תרעישו יותר מידי (במיוחד בלי מוזיקה רועשת לאחר השעה 23:00). 
בבקשה תנעלו את הבית כשאתם יוצאים וכבו את האור והמזגן.
• אנא - ללא עישון/צ'ק -אאוט מאוחר - אם אחד מאלה מתרחש במהלך שהותכם, תחויבו בתשלום של 100$.
• המחיר הסופי מתייחס לאורחים המבקרים בישראל באשרת תייר (B2/B3/B4)
אורחים אחרים, או אורחים שאינם מציגים עותק של בקרת גבולות ותעודה מזהה המונפקת ע"י הממשלה, יחויבו במע"מ בשיעור של 17%.
• המחיר המוצג לא כולל מ"עמ.
• כמו כן, זה לא חובה אבל מוערך מאוד - אתם מקבלים את המקום נקי, אנא החזירו אותו במצב טוב, ולא בלגן מוחלט :)
••• אנו מאחלים לכם שהייה נהדרת, תודה שבחרתם להישאר אצלנו! •••
interaction: We offer a hassle free SELF CHECK IN using a lockbox. You get the full freedom to decide how you want this experience to be; if you want to meet face to face, we are down for it! If you prefer having it "the local way" and manage independently, that's also cool. Up to you ?
transit: You will need at least 2 weeks to explore everything in our surroundings, be sure you will never get bored here, we call it "the tourist's Kingdom" for a reason ;) ❤ Check out our Instagram for more tips and recommendations!

reviews.response: Hey, Shoham! Thank you so much for being our guest! :) Hoping to see you soon!

reviews.comments: The communication and check in was really good and unproblematic, however there were cockroaches and on the floor and the room smelled musty and moldy
reviews.response: Hey, Lina! Thank you for your review. I’m sorry to hear you had a frustrating experience, but I really appreciate you bringing this issue to my attention. This is something that is not common within our team. We do try our best to make all of our guests’ stay as comfortable as possible. Rest assured that I will personally see to it that this doesn’t happen again.

reviews.comments: Great place! Very pretty and cozy. Location was good. I would absolutely recommend.
reviews.response: Hey, Macarena! Thanks for placing your trust in us and your willingness to share. We're happy you had a fantastic time with us! Thanks for your trust, we're thankful for amazing guests like you.

reviews.comments: The apartment was in a fantastic location, had an easy check-in, and was lovely and cozy

name: Italian design apartment in Rotchild /habima
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.

description: Right on the historical Rothschild street and only few steps form the famous Habima theater this apartment is going to give you the quiet and relaxation you need while staying right where all the main attractions are.One bedroom one big open space kitchen, living room, 2 bathroom and a sunny balcony where you can enjoy your morning coffee overlooking Rotchild street.The place was highly designed by an Italian architect to ensure our guests in the ultimate in luxury and quality.The spaceThis apartment is situated in a renovated Bauhaus building in centrally located and famous Rothschild Blvd.  The ambiance of the apartment, however, is serene and a perfect escape from outside noise.  The apartment is highly designed by an italian architect, which further emphasizes and promotes the vacation atmosphere.  It all begins with a large bedroom with a king size bed, 2 bathrooms and an open layout kitchen and living room.  Perfect for couples, solo travelers, or those traveling for business.Your perfect getaway begins with morning coffee on the balcony with a view of happening  Rothschild Blvd under you.  After a long day of sightseeing, the fully equipped kitchen gives you the option of having a low key dinner at home.  Too tired to cook?  I provide a useful guide of to Tel Avivs finest in wining and dining.Guest accessYou will have access to the whole apartment. amenities will include:DishwasherWashing machineCoffe machineOvenTV ChannelsWiFIElavatorACIndoor ShowerToilet and SinkShampoo/body soapTowelsBig couchTable and ChairsKitchenFridge and freezerClean Linens Iron  Hair drierOther things to noteRothschild Boulevard is one of the most important and iconic streets in Tel Aviv. Located in the heart of the White City of Tel Aviv, Rothschild Boulevard is a commercial center, with major financial institutions lining the street, a cultural center, with the main theater and concert hall of Tel Aviv, Habima, a culinary center, with tons of top restaurants, and a leisure center, with the center of the boulevard popular with dog walkers, bikers, and some of Tel Aviv’s wealthiest and most beautiful who stop off at the amazing coffee kiosks found in the center of the street.
interaction: I will be available all the time. Happy to suggest my favorite places in the city

reviews.comments: This was a fantastic stay in a wonderful location. I hope to come back soon.
Great apartment in a super central area. Stylish and bright. We had a great time and will be happy to visit again.
Nice apartment in the Rothschild area.  Very responsive and great at communication.
reviews.response: Am so glad you enjoyed your stay, Chitwan! I hope you visit again soon !!

reviews.comments: Great apartment in a perfect location. very quiet at night. The apartment is very clean, looks exactly as the photographs. we had a great time and will surely come back again. i highly recommend the place
The appartment was in the heart of Tel Aviv, close to everything, clean and quiet. We  have enjoyed it very much.
Great location, beautiful apartment
Great place, highly recommended

This is a super great apartment – modern, nicely designed, clean and comfortable. The location is amazing – Tel-Aviv’s prime locations are all within walking distance. Vered is a great host – very quick to respond and always helpful with any question we had. Everything was perfect and we look forward to returning!

location cant be any better!
and the place is super comftable and clean

Searching for a place to stay for a night can be frustrating sometimes when you're trying to get in touch with a Host. Our host was extremely friendly and helpful and accommodated our needs. The place was very clean and had plenty of room. This was a beautiful apartment and we look forward to staying here again.
We had a great stay, the location is perfect, the apartment is renovated and stylish, highly recommended!
Great location, clean apartment, good for short stay in Tel Aviv
The place is as shown on the pictures. The location is great and I received help when needed quickly.

The appartment is located in a great location in the city center, close to many things. It's relatively big and has a nice porch and all the required equipment.
The communication with the hosts was fast, kind and efficient.
It was clean but we felt like not cleaned/maintened enough, especially if taking in account the high cleaning fee.
It was amazing.

We had a great time. Originally we planned to only stay a few days in this apartment but ended up staying there for almost two weeks :) It was clean, spacious, in a perfect center location and the host was wonderful and quick to respond. Highly recommend it!
Amazing place. Center Tel Aviv. Very clean, well designed and very big. Loved every minute

We had the most amazing time the apartment was beautiful, the location was amazing. Would definitely return!

Thank you!

We had a great weekend at Diletta' place. It is beautiful, very clean, cozy and well designed.  The location is perfect and we even had no problem in finding parking (Friday at around 3pm). It could also fit 2 couples.  We highly recommend. Thank you Diletta.
Best location in TLV. Very clean Apartment. Luxury design.
reviews.response: Thank you for choosing us, Ohad. It was a pleasure hosting you. Hope to see you again soon.

description: The apartment is located in one of the best places in Tel Aviv. On Ben Yehuda / Arlozorov, 100 meters from the beach and the Hilton. Close to the most renowned restaurants, cafes and bars.The apartment with a beautiful sunny balcony, is designed for couples and friends that wants to enjoy the city, or families that just need a little gate away of pure relax . I am also available 24/7 to help you have the best stay in Tel Aviv (restaurant reservations, advices, places to eat,  etc..)The spaceQuiet apartment perfectly located in the best location of Tel aviv, only one block away from Hilton Beach. PoP ArT is located on the third floor with no elevator.The apartment is very spacious and full of sunlight you will also have a little balcony where you can enjoy your morning coffee.The room offers a comfortable queen size bed with quality pillow and sheets.In the living room we have a comfy couch that opens up into a 1.40 meter bed, that can host 2  more people. The entrance to the bathroom is in the living room. All rooms are air-conditioned. In the living room you can enjoy the T.V. with a huge collections of moviesIf you feel that you want to cook at home, the kitchen is fully equipped with everything you want  - espresso machine, microwave, kettle, refrigerator, and of course all the tools you will need.Here is a quick update on the amenities•Indoor Shower•Toilet and Sink•Shampoo/body soap•Towels•big couch•Table and Chairs•Kitchen• Fridge and freezer•Nespresso machine•Clean Linens•Fridge for Food/Drink•Card Game•TV•Fast Wi-fi• Iron • Hair drier• double bedThe location is perfect!2 minutes walk from Hilton beach and independence park.Five minute walk to the Tel-Aviv Port (the city's hottest nightlife and restuarant district) and Hayarkon Park.5 min walk from Dizingof centerBen-Yehuda st. is parallel to Dizengof st. which is known for the cafe's and shops on it.Both streets have excellent public transportation running through them.The apartment is also 2 minutes walking distance fromthe "Ulpan" on La Salle street.Guest accessHigh speed Wi-Fi, large TV with access to all the most up to date movies and tv shows.The apartment is fully air conditioned and the kitchen is fully equipped (microwave, washing machines, Nespresso machine, toaster, large fridge, water boiling machine).The bed sheets are perfectly clean and towels are furnished. I offer multiple cleaning options as i have other apartments and am in contact with qualified cleaning persons.Other things to noteIf you have a foreign passport (not Israeli), the total price will be the same as the one you booked online on the website, as shown on the reservation.Please note that all guest residing in Israel (Israeli Passport Holder) is subject to a 17% value-added tax (on top of the nightly rate) which will be collected separately via Airbnb :) .Thank you for your understanding!And see you soon!Thank you for your understanding!And see you soon!

reviews.comments:
Although the apartment had just been cleaned when we checked in, it was grimy and dirty, and the whole apartment needed a good, deep clean (even the dishes were not properly cleaned). We spotted several cockroaches in the building hallway, and bloody gooey evidence of them on the apartment walls. And amenities were lacking: only one small frying pan (in poor condition), no tea or sugar, watered-down hand soap, not enough toilet paper, etc.

That said, the location is fantastic and the hosts were responsive and nice. This is a decent budget apartment, but not worth the price they are charging. Know what you are getting before renting this apartment.

This is a simply and nicely pop-art furnished apartment in an outstanding location very near the beach and great Tel Aviv restaurants.  Ideal for one person or couple who do not mind climbing 3 flights of stairs to get to it. Written instructions for lockbox check-in and check-out are very clear. So are the instructions for WiFi, boiler etc. Everything was clean, everything worked. There was a Nespresso machine with capsules a hairdryer and a washing machine. Very useful. Shampoo, douche-gel, and body-lotion were provided too.   All communication with Vivi was friendly and efficient.

I was in the appartment just few hours buttñ everything was great.

The apartment is located ideally if you are planning on visiting the nearby beaches or the main boulevards filled with bars and restaurants in Tel Aviv. Only a few minutes from the beach, enjoying the sunset over the sea after a quick afternoon nap is a must :-) The apt is spacious enough and provides all needed equipment, including a coffee machine and a washing machine (couldn't find a place to dry the clothed, though, so we did not use it). Ask for specific instructions on how to get to (i.e. Apt number, floor, etc.) and into the apartment (self check-in), as none are provided after booking via the platform. Also, if you need hot water, you'd have to turn the boiler on - probably it used to be automatically switched on and off via a timer, but we found ot that the timer has already been nulled. This is s general advice if you are staying in the city center of Tel Aviv - get some ear plugs if you want a quiet sleep. Although this apt was on the third floor and the bedroom was on the side of the building, you could still hear thr noise from the streets (unless you sre visiting on Friday through Saturday - then it's all peaceful and quiet due to the shabbat).
This apartment is ideally located in the heart of Tel Aviv, a short walking distance to the beach. Very comfortable for a couple or one person needing some space. Highly recommended

Uiteindelijk was t 4,5 uur later schoongemaakt. Kortom; niet echt een aanrader maar het kan erger.

I also wrote this to Ori privately and hope he takes it as a good opportunity to improve its service towards his guests.

Good location, friendly host. It is probably worth being aware of a few things: ask for directions how to find the place as the entrance is on the side street was difficult to find. Secondly the bedroom doesn’t really have proper windows, only Curtains that cover a partial window a fourth the size of the window. It is very close to the beach but in the evening depending on where you go you have to go through the closed down market which was ok but not so comfortable for two females. We ended up taking a bit of a detour as we didn’t feel too safe walking the very dark alleys. Again not a huge issue but worth being aware of. Overall location is good. It has two bathrooms which is also good. It is cleanish but not squeaky clean like other flats we stayed in in TLV.   Especially the bathroom feels like it needs a bit of a proper deep cleanse. We didn’t use  (the Two!) TVs or sizeable kitchen but looked good. What’s nice is the little wardrobe like room where you can keep your suitcases. The size is good.

perfect for short/long stay in Tel Aviv . It is so clean and cozy , the best location near the beach and  market. Waking distance to every place that you want to go. reviews.comments:
We spent two weeks in Shai's apartment and we had a lovely time.
The building is well maintained and perfectly located close to everything this trendy artistic neighborhood has to offer.
The apartment is accurate to description, we enjoyed having our breakfasts on the balcony or a night drink with the evening breeze.
There are two very economical parking lots close by. (cheaper than others in the area) a supermarket literally on the same block, as well as two drugstores on the main street less than 5 minutes walk.
There is an abundance of eateries and pubs and the pizza right under the building is quite good as well as the Ice Cream place around the corner on the main street.
We had some minor requests and they were super sweet, attentive, polite, and quick to help.
One thing to note during our stay some street and road work took place if you are coming with a vehicle it may affect your ability to move freely (some roads were closed, traffic jams, and so on)
All in All, We had a wonderful experience and we will surely return.
Thanks, guys!
We really enjoyed our stay at Shai’s place. Bars and restaurants were just steps away. The place is very clean, and Shai’s instructions for check-in were really clear. Thank you for having us!

Shai was a wonderful host. It can be tough coordinating with a host in a different time zone and making sure things are all lined up for when you arrive in a new place, and Shai was so great at responding to all of my questions in a quick and efficient manner. The space itself was clean, with detailed descriptions of how to use everything. I highly recommend this space!

Though small, this place is very clean and has all the amenities for a comfortable stay. Communication was clear, prompt and friendly. As previous guests have mentioned - it's closer to 20 min walking from the beach, and it's rather on the edge of Florentin, in an area with a few newly built towers than felt a bit soulless to us. Also, this seems to be one of many Airbnbs run by the host as a business (Beach Apartments - TLV), so the experience is more like being a hotel guest than being hosted.

Very cozy apartment in the quiet part of the trendy Florentin neighborhood. The location is great, bars and restaurants are literally around the block, you can easily walk to the old Jaffa  (about 20 min away), same for the beach! The apartment is in a secured building, nicely furnished and match exactly with the description. Shai has been very helpful and responsive during the entire stay, great host! Overall, I really recommend this place.

This is definitely the best place I've ever stayed in Tel Aviv. The apartment is gorgeous and new, and stocked with everything you could possibly need; the location is perfect - steps away from everything, including the best bars and restaurants in Florentin (but still completely quiet inside at  night!); and the guys were amazing...they responded to every little question I had within minutes, by phone or in person. A fantastic value.

I spent 2 weeks at Shai’s apartment and had a fantastic stay. The building is well maintained and secure and the location is unbeatable, right in the heart of Florentin, one of the coolest areas of Tel Aviv! Having a supermarket downstairs as well as a 24 hr convenience store a few steps away made the stay even better. The apartment was exactly as described and the amazing AC, super comfortable bed and great water pressure were highlights. Any minor request was dealt with super fast and Shai was always available and was very friendly and courteous. This was an amazing experience with Shai and his AirBNB and I would highly recommend to anyone visiting Tel Aviv!

The apartment is at a great location, in the heart of florentin next to great bars and restaurant. It is also well connected by public transportation and close to the beach.

The apartment is generally as described on the listing and the management is trust worthy. There are a few appliances that could use some maintenance but nothing major. (We also had some issue with one of the doors and their maintenance fixed it in no time. Very effective services )

The apartment comes clean, the bed is comfortable and the water pressure is good.

I would highly recommend for a short stay in Tel Aviv.
Shai was an amazing host! The communication was great and the place was beyond my expectation. Highly recommended!

Clean, cozy apartment in cool Florentine. Close to Jaffa, Levinsky market, a short walk to Carmel market (depending on your pace ;) ).

Loads of bars, supermarkets, mini markets, restaurants etc.

WiFi, cooking equipment, TV with cable. The only regret is that I am now horribly addicted to Israeli soap operas!

Bathroom is clean, supplied and the shower is powerful.

Any questions asked were answered almost immediately.

This was an AMAZING first experience with Shai, his team and Air BnB.

Five stars!!!!!

The apartment is perfect for staying a few days in Tel Aviv! Quite close to Jaffa and the beach and bars and restaurants are nearby. The size is absolutely sufficient for two people and it is located in a safe apartment house.
Shai was always very helpful when we contacted him with questions. We would definitely book again when we return to Tel Aviv.

We absolutely loved this place! Very easy and straightforward check in instructions, and Shai was quick to respond to our messages in a very friendly and professional manner.

Location was great! We took the public bus (445) from the airport and the closest stop was about 10 min from the apartment (which was very easy to find). Loved that we didn’t have to use public transportation once as everything we wanted to see was within walking distance.

The apartment itself had everything we needed, which definitely made it feel like “home.” Very cute set up, sparkling clean and nice little homey touches. We’ve been traveling for over a month and it was the first Airbnb to provide us with 2 keys, which was really nice since we didn’t always want to go out at the same time. Sofa was incredibly comfortable for sleeping, as was the main bed.

Neighborhood felt really safe, and it felt fun and lively at night. So many awesome restaurants, cafes and grocery stores nearby. Definitely head to Anitas (only 3 min walk from the apartment!)- best frozen yogurt we’ve ever had.

Some downfalls:
*instructions for garbage disposal could’ve been better since it’s written to leave outside in the green bin, but you have to use the code to enter a room with the garbage bins. We would’ve never figured this out on our own if we didn’t ask one of the residents living in the building.
* neighbors could be really loud, so if you have trouble sleeping that could be an issue
* it says they have 2 balconies which is technically true, however one of them is tiny and full of bird droppings. We never used this one but loved the other larger one with chairs and a table.

Overall we thought this place was amazing and would definitely stay here again if we come back to Tel Aviv.

Nice modern apartment in cool Florentin area. Plenty of nice bars and restaurants within walking distance. Also not far to the beach (20 mins walk) and Jaffa old town. Apartment was clean with good amenities. There is a bit of a problem with pigeons in this apartment block leaving a real mess daily on one of the balconies.
Easy check-in with key box, great location and well equipped apartment
Local area good for cafes and restaurants
Really great apartment. Nice Style, very clean and the bed is super comfortable. Big recommendation from us :)
Great little apartment and trendy location. Shai was a very accomodating and responsive host. Highly recommend
Was incredibly easy process to check in, place was delightful and central. Easy for two people, fresh, clean and having air con was great!

The flat is not big but enough for two persons. The way to the sea beach will takes around 20 min. by walk. A lot of pubs, street restaurants and cafes around. If you’re planning a shopping tour this place is too far from shopping centers. To sleep with open window is very loud there because of huge cafe and small Square located down stairs.
So finally it’s a not excellent but very good flat to stay in Tel Aviv for several days.
Everthing was fine!
Best location! Great apartment, very cozy and had everything we needed. Great hosts! They were always there when needed and really nice guys :) totally would stay there again!

המקום קטן מאוד, הקומקום לא עבד, הברז במקלחת לא תקין, אין מה לראות בטלוויזיה, הרעש בבוקר נוראי פועלים צועקים על הבוקר טרקטורים חופרים נורא ביותר. השכן מלמעלה מתלונן על עישון במרפסתתת והזמין לנו שוטרים. באמצע היום בעלי הדירה מחליט שהוא בא לבדוק את הדירה לוודא שהכל תקין ללא סיבה מוצדקת. היחס וחוסר הגמישות מול בעלי הדירה מתחת לכל ביקורת לא מוכנים להתפשר או לבוא לקראת אף מתארח והמחיר ממש לא שווה את התמורה!

Sehr nette Wohnung
Gute Lage. Zu Fuß ist man schnell in Jaffa und mit dem Bus in 15min beim Bahnhof.
Unter dem Appartement gibt's nen sehr leckeren Bäcker mit gutem Kaffee

Séjour agréable au sein d'un quartier animé. L'appartement est très bien situé proche toutes commodités.

Petit bémol, la climatisation en mode chauffage (pour le soir) ne fonctionne pas.

Bonito apartamento y en el barrio de Florentin, con locales de comida, bares y supermercados cercanos, zona que transmite buena seguridad y con buen acceso a diferentes zonas de la ciudad caminando.
Muy recomendable y como único
inconveniente la poca flexibilidad en los horarios de entrada y salida

Goede service, contact was vlot. Locatie top, gezellige wijk met veel horeca gelegenheden en het strand op ongeveer 10 minuten lopen. Appartement was prima, aan de kleine kant maar voor 2/3 personen prima te doen! Wij hebben het goed gehad :)
Gute Lage, unkomplizierte und einfache Kommunikation mit Shai, schönes und einfaches Appartement, einfacher Check-IN, Preis-Leistung top.
Удобное расположение квартиры, всё чисто. Трудноват-то было найти парковку, но в итоге парковались недалеко в промышленной зоне.

Tout est positif !
À noter: L'activation de l'eau chaude pour la douche se fait par un bouton au dessus du meuble TV ! Je l'ai cherché avec l'aide de shai, mais sans le comprendre du 1er coup! Pb d'anglais

Appartement très agréable et très bien placé

Séjour top! David a été réactif, disponible, adorable, présent et toujours à l’écoute. C’est un hôte très gentil et très réactif.
L’emplacement est juste parfait ! Sur un grand axe, avec 1 arrêt de bus au pied de l’immeuble où passent beaucoup de lignes de bus pour aller partout! Supérettes et divers commerces en nombre au pied de l’appartement idéal pour les courses (dont un ouvert 24/24h) à trois min de la plage. Magnifique!
L’appartement est spacieux, la chambre est équipée d’un énorme dressing idéal pour les séjours longs! On y est comme à la maison! Le balcon est grand, avec une table et des chaises pour les petits déjeuners au soleil (le matin plein soleil sur le balcon c’est génial) ou pour un petit apéro ! Vraiment top.
La climatisation est fonctionnelle et efficace (pas de clim dans la chambre mais un fan au plafond très silencieux idéal pour la nuit).
Le wifi est rapide idéal pour bosser si besoin!
Les équipements : Machine à laver et étendoir à disposition pour les séjours longs c’est impeccable! Lave vaisselle micro ondes grand frigo ! Table à manger pour dîner à plusieurs , canapé lit dans le séjour et une vraie chambre avec un lit double. La salle de bain est fonctionnelle et propre, douche et toilettes propres également, (+ sèche cheveux de pro! J’adore !)
Tout est fait pour séjourner sans aucun stress, aucun problème d’intendance tout est pratique et idéal ! Je suis ravie de mon séjour chez David et reviendrais sans aucune hésitation! Merci pour tout !

Appartement idéalement placé ! À 150m de la mer. Énormément de restos et bars aux alentours. Dans l’appartement tout l’électroménager  disponible (micro-ondes, lave vaisselle, lave linge, four et grand frigo). Internet qui fonctionne super bien (fibre optique). Petit balcon avec table qui permet de dîner dehors. Grande réactivité de Yohan. Bon rapport qualité prix. Les choses qui pourraient être améliorées : un meilleur lit, des meilleurs coussins, un peu de décoration et l’ajout d’une télé ne serait pas de trop. Je recommande à 1000% !

description: Top of the range, newly built 2 bedroom apartment on a quiet Tel Aviv street. The apartment oozes class. From the design to the finishing through to the furniture and decor. All done to the highest spec making for a top class apartment. Spacious well-equipped room in a cozy apartment, located In the hip Florentine area, close to the Levinsky Spice Market, and within walking distance to most major sites in Tel Aviv, including, most importantly the beachThe spaceThe apartment has an open plan feel with the kitchen, living room and dining room opening on to a balcony and there are 2 double bedrooms, bathroom and guest toilet within 70 sq-m of space. There is a elevator. The perfect chance to enjoy great location with everything two steps away aswell as high quality apartment. A lot of the antique buildings were renovated, this place is very popular among tourists.This great place has the advantage of being right in the center of TLV, withinThe perfect space at a great location with everything within a walking distance:300 m / 0.2 mile to Levinsky Spice market700 m / 0.4 mile to Neve Tsedek900 m / 0.55 mile to Rotschild Blvd1 km / 0.6 mile to the beach1 km / 0.6 mile to Ha'carmel Market and Nahalat Binyamin's artist market1.1 km / 0.7 mile to Jaffa's bustling Flea Market   This great place has the advantage of being right in the center of TLV, withinwalking distance to the most amazing places on Tel Aviv and all you need: • beach (1.5 Km)Lots of great and popular cafés, restaurants, bars and places to party (we willbe happy to recommend!) around the apartment.As well as:• Green bike- city bike rental (150 meters)• Pharmacy (200 meter)• 24/7 super market (100 meters)The apartment is fully furnished and equipped. Has air conditioning, with heating function.The 2 bedroom contains a high quality double bed and singel bed+closet.The decorated living room is bright and sunny and has comfortable sofas, and TV.Features and amenities/facilities provided:- Bed linens, towels, shampoo and soaps.- Fully equipped kitchen including: electric kettle, espresso machine, microwave, dishwasher, toaster, fridge/freezer,stove, oven and cookware.- Free coffee and tea - HD TV with cable TV (cellcom tv)- In-unit washer and dryer- Free high speed Wi-Fi- Tel Aviv-Jaffa city map
transit: Public transportation - many buses stop at Salame streetMetered street parking available as well as the nearby Florentine parking garagesRenting a bike or a scooter is the best way to roam around Tel Aviv

reviews.comments: This place was lovely! It was super clean, a big space for the city. Walkable to just about everywhere. Nice amenities. We all had a brilliant time!
Amazing!
The apartment is amazing and it’s in a great location in the heart of things. The hosts were great. Will definitely stay there again. Highly Recommend!!!!
Great location. Clean.
Nice apartment, location and hosts :)

The apartment is in a good location 30 min walk to the beach and old Jaffa.

We have an early checkin which was great.

On the first day we had no hot water and the lack of a quick response from the host was frustrating.

The apartment is stylish and comfortable.

I feel its overpriced for the amenities.
Wow, Thank you for your amazing hospitality. We will definitely will come again :)

Really enjoyed our 4 night stay. Stylish well appointed and spotless apartment in a happening part of town. Well connected to transport. Easy and clear instructions on how to enter apartment. Would love to stay again.
Great place!
Lovely flat and great communication throughout our stay. Thank you also for the nice welcome!

The perfect place to stay in Tel Aviv. The apartment is modern, clean and spacious. In terms of location, you can easily get to the beach by walking or using one of the many electric scooters located in the city.

The hosts were excellent at communicating everything before, during and after our stay. They’ve provided amazing service and a fantastic apartment!

The appartement is new and perfectly furnished and equipped. Breakfast on the little balcony is the ideal starting point for Tel Aviv discoveries. The location is extra and, although a commercial offer, the host was very nice, helpful, always available and even brought us some Nespresso capsules :-). Thanks a lot!
A spacious and very beautiful furnished apartment. A bit noisy due to many construction sites in the neighbourhood.

Our stay here was absolutely first class, this was an excellent example of what an Airbnb should be. Everything was neat and tidy the facilities were fantastic, everything that we needed at our fingertips the apartment had a beautiful space and it was perfect for our little family stay.

We would very happily recommend this place and also stay again in the future. Definitely up there with our top Airbnb stays ever.

The place was really great and we enjoyed our stay. The flat is very spacious and well furnished. We however noted that the door of the two-bedrooms room does not close, which can be rather annoying. Although the neighborhood may seem rather unwelcoming at first sight, it is really nice and hip. There are cool restaurants and bars close to the apartment and you will see very nice graffitis when wandering in the surroundings.

Simon’s place is a great location in Tel Aviv, in the middle of Florentin with lots to do and 10 mins walk from the beach. The appartment is modern and full of light, and you will have to push yourself to leave it.  The owners were really responsive and helpful when I asked random questions!

Very nice apartment and it’s super easy to get in contact. They were very helpful in any case.
The apartment was super clean and looks just amazing.
Too bad we could only spend one night there.
Le logement est très agréable. Il correspond au descriptif.

reviews.comments: This apartment is right in heart of the Flea Market area. It was perfect for exploring Jaffa and Tel Aviv. The road outside gets a little loud so if you have a hard time sleeping, bring ear plugs. The apartment had everything I needed and was comfortable.
reviews.response: Hi, Theresa! Thank you so much for the heads up for our other guests. As for the loud noise, we do add this information on our listing so that we can set proper expectations to our guests who will be staying with us. I'm so glad you liked the place. Looking forward to your next stay!

reviews.comments:
If you're an individual, a couple, or just two friends looking for a cool place to stay in Tel Aviv/Jaffa, look no further.

Ali and Adah's apartment is perfect. It's located at the heart of the flea market, literally a few steps away from the booths, 2 minutes from the famous Abulafia bakery (24/7) which you HAVE to visit, with at least 4 great knafe places (again, a must), malabi and sahlab stores (Jaffa is known for these yummy deserts), a stone's throw from Ali Karawan, arguably the best humous in town (if not in the entire country), and a really nice grocery store (again, 24/7) in the main street (Oley Tziyon). There are more knafe, baklawa and other interesting stores in the near-by Yefet St.

There's also a cosy little cafe just next door (Piece of Cake) and some of the best bars and restaurants, with street parties, live music and amazing atmosphere (try Raisa, lovely food, great vibes). Fancy a beer on Friday noon? Visit the bars (they're all at the same area, around Rabbi Yohanan St.).

And best of all: The beaches, promenade and old Jaffa port are literally 3 minutes away!

The street and surrounding alleys are mostly charming. The view from the balcony is picturesque, with the famous clock tower looming in the distance.

The apartment is quaint, tastefully renovated and chic. You can tell it's old but that's part of the magic, and it'sin a pretty good condition. There are big chandeliers and beautiful artwork on the walls. The dining table can be opened if you invite friends over for a meal. And there are various cupboards and drawers if you need.

The shower works really well, with very hot water, and exuberant stream, as long as you set the heater in advance (red button).

The TV works well, with Netflix, YouTube and Amazon Prime as the only options.

There's basic kitchenware, a fridge and a stove if you need, but honestly with such lovely food around me I wouldn't bother.

The hosts were forthcoming and very communicative. Even after a misunderstanding on their part, they took full responsibility to quickly handle it, and you could tell that they, and their management team, actually cared.

A few things to keep on mind though:
- While the apartment is great and the location is perfect, it is NOT quiet. You will get into the Jaffa state-of-mind, meaning traders talking aloud or shouting, traffic jams on Friday night with Millennials screaming from their car, drivers hooting... So if you're going you hold a vipasana workshop and need silence, then this apartment is NOT for you.
- There are only (quite a few) stairs, no lift. So I don't think it's accessible, nor is it a good fit if walking upwards or carrying stuff is an issue.

- There's a roof you can visit, I don't recommend it as the experience is not great. Enjoy the balcony or go out instead!

Overall, we really enjoyed the apartment. It's well-suited for a couple, quite big, sun flooded, and if you want to enjoy Tel Aviv/Jaffa's hidden gems, do book it for a long weekend or so.

We can't wait to come back again!
reviews.response: Hey, Adam! Thanks very much for your balanced and fair review of our place. I'm glad you felt the place was well done. It's something we've worked hard on and we're pleased our efforts resonated with you. And yes, I do agree, although the noise is something that's not within our control that's also part of staying here, you get to experience the magic and the busyness of the city and feel more like a local other than a tourist. Perhaps a room not facing the street would be a better future choice for you should you consider staying with us again. Thank you!

reviews.comments: Great location. Wasn’t clean enough. We got there late so they had nothing they could do (they said that otherwise they would send someone).
reviews.response: Hey, Or! Thanks so much for your thoughtful and detailed review. This is incredibly helpful. I wanted to let you know we've taken the good and the bad elements you've mentioned in your review to heart. I hope we get to redeem ourselves with your next stay with us in the near future!

reviews.comments: Well this place is amazing! Huge apartment, perfect location, extremely clean and cosy, and just a wonderful experience overall! I made my reservation last minute and the hosts were super professional, available and friendly from the beginning! I really recommend you to enjoy the balcony view and sunset light. The location couldn’t be any better, bars and restaurants are walking distance, as well as the beach. The apartments is big and comfortable, and you have everything you need for a magical Jaffa experience! Highly recommended :)
reviews.response:
Hey, Barbara. We're grateful for your honest feedback and we're glad you feel we're on the right track! Our priority is customer service and we are ecstatic that we met that mark! Kind guests like you make our job a pleasure.

Looking forward to your next reservation with us!

reviews.comments: A very nice apartment in a wonderful location.
reviews.response: Hi, Gefen. I'm so glad that you liked the apartment. I hope you had fun during your reservation! I look forward to seeing you again as our guest :)

reviews.comments:
Very nice apartment with spacious living room and really comfortable bed, looks exactly as on the pictures with one exception: the view from the balcony is much lovelier in reality)

The host was always in contact with us whenever we needed anything. When we came, there were couple of things missing but after our request in a couple of hours it was fixed completely.

There is no washing machine and oven (if you want to bake something) but that is stated in the description. Everything else for living is there.

Wifi was not so good from time to time, but that is a problem of 99% of apartments in Tel-Aviv, so it is better to buy a local sim-card with mobile internet to be sure.

The house is really 1 minute from the flea market and many good restaurants. Nice bakery with good coffee is right in front of it. It took us 5-7 minutes to get to the nearest beach and just couple of minutes more to the old city of Jaffa. To get to the Tel-Aviv center you can use a bus or rent a scooter/bike. We really enjoyed staying in this apartment.

So, overall, if you like the atmosphere of Jaffa and flea market, I can definitely recommend this apartment.
מעולה

reviews.comments:
דירה מתוקה במיקום מעולה, קרובה למקומות הכי שווים ומלאה בקסם של יפו.
ההוראות היו מדויקות והדירה בדיוק כמו בתמונות. מארחים חמודים ואפילו קיבלנו לילה נוסף בחינם!
בהחלט ממליצים!

הנכס נעים ונחמד.. במיקום מעולה .
אבל המחיר הוא פשוט הזוי! כמעט 900 ש"ח ללילה שאתה סה"כ מקבל דירה לישון בה, בלי שום דבר נוסף, זה מחיר מאוד גבוה ולא מצדיק בעיניי (-:
חייבת לציין שהמארחים נחמדים ומגיבים מהר, אמנם מדיניות הביטולים הדרקונית שלהם חייבה אותנו להגיע על אף כך שלאחר ההזמנה, התבקשנו להוסיף מע"מ וביקשנו לבטל את ההזמנה, אך לא יכולנו כי זה היה שבועיים לםני

קיצור - אני חושבת שהנכס נעים ונחמד, אך יקר מדי. לא אלך שוב במחיר הזה.
reviews.response: Hey there. I'm sorry if the price has been an issue with the reservation. I understand that some circumstances are not within our control however we do have a cancellation policy that we abide to and this is the reason why. Also, the VAT information is listed on our apartment's description for our guests to review in both Hebrew and in English. We did not add this as we do get reservations not just from locals but also from tourists. We don't want them to pay for something that they're not supposed to pay. I hope you understand. But thank you so much for the lovely words. I hope to see you again on your next reservation with us. :)

reviews.comments:
קומה 3 ללא מעלית. מדרגות תלולות.
רמת הניקיון נמוכה ותחזוקת הדירה ירודה.

בחדר השינה המזגן לא עבד ושמענו את הדיירים מהדירה הסמוכה(קיר גבס משותף)כל הלילה והריחנו את הגראס שהם עישנו.
כשרצינו שירות נעננו במהירות ובנחמדות.
reviews.response: Hi, Einav. I'm sorry for hearing those inconveniences that you have experienced. However the information about the stairs and no elevator is listed on our apartment's listing. Also I wish we could have known about these inconveniences that you were having during your stay with us and we would've definitely provided help immediately. But thank you for letting us know about this.

reviews.comments: היה נהדר. המיקום פנטסטי! בלקון מושלם.
reviews.response: Hi, Anat! That's truly great to hear that you had a wonderful time with us. We did enjoy hosting you as our guest. I look forward to seeing you again on your next reservation with us!

reviews.comments:
המיקום של הדירה מעולה.
הדירה עצמה מיוחדת ויפה.
הנאה מובטחת
reviews.response: Hi, Ronen! Thank you so much for those kind words. We do try our best to ensure our guest's happiness during their stay. I look forward to seeing you soon on your next reservation with us!

description: Sunny 2BR apartment which located on Hakovshim Street. This is a cozy budget apartment with private 2  balconies, 50 sqm in size perfect for friends or  families – great value for money. Its fully equipped, full kitchenette, wifi, cables, renovated shower and toilet.Located only a block from Geula beach and a world away from real life.  Neve-Tzedek and Ben-Yehuda Street are just at your doorstep. 24/7 groceries and pharmacies are just outside. Public transportation is available easily as well.

reviews.comments: Li was a fantastic host for our last minute stay.
Location is great. Interior is nice and comfortable for 3-5 guests. A/C was semi-functional in one of the rooms when we stayed during the hot summer. Overall, pretty good stay.
Great location right on the beach. Photos not an accurate reflection. Several small issues.

The customer service provided by Li was awful. The fact that Airbnb has branded him a “Super host” is embarrassing. Don’t be fooled. The apartment I booked was completely misrepresented and below reasonable expected standards. The subpar apartment is besides the point. I immediately voiced my concerns to Li, just a couple hours after check in and that’s when he went silent. It was only until the next morning after I reached out to Airbnb  customer service that I am self checking out because I couldn’t bare to stay any longer, is when he decided to reply. The purpose of this review is to give other travelers a heads up on what they can expect from Li and not details of the apartment itself. I will therefore end this review by warning other travelers to beware.
Great location, great apartment
Li was a great host and his place was very clean and perfect for our needs. Definitely a recommend!

Do not recommend this place.  It is full of mold and electrical plugs sticking out of kitchen.  Noisy buses that rattle the house. Host took a very long time to respond to check in requests.  Not as pictured in the photos. Very disappointing experience. Way overpriced.

The air bnb was perfect for our short stay. The flat was clean, accurate to pictures, and very comfortable to live in. Li was so helpful and quick to respond to any assistance. The two balconies were amazing and so lovely to sit on for meals.

The only tiny issue was the noise outside of the apartment and also the light that came through the curtains! other than that, wear an eye-mask! I would recommend Li's place :)
Great price and location
Very pleasant time spent in Tel Aviv at Li’s. Thank you again
Perfect
Great host

Li was very easy to communicate with and the place was great. It’s in a fantastic location close to the shuk and the beach, but it’s a little smaller than we expected. Nonetheless, you wouldn’t want to spend the time at home anyway

Very amazing "feel like a local" place to stay extra close to beach, Carmel Market and  Allenby street. Private spacious parking just across the road, bus stops a few steps away, playground for kids just across the road. Great for families or groups of singles. Very clean, tourist info folders, hairdryer, grill, microwave... all a well equipped kitchen needs. Very clean bedding, towels, all we needed. Loved the fact of east facing windows for extra morning light.  And cool afternoons. (And thick, dark curtains for long undisturbed sleep.) Having been there late February with friends and adult kids, the separate bedrooms and the shared living room were just perfect for us. Very cool style. Having been to Israel many times, here we felt instantly at home and like locals. Any time again.

Li is an amazing host! Many thanks for the quick responses. He was ready to answer and help us any time we needed it. We arrived earlier and got a chance to meet Li in person. He was very kind and offered us an upgrade (it was just on the next street from our originally booked apartment). The apartment was not ready for our arrival so we just left our stuff and went to explore the city. When we came back, everything was cleaned and ready for our stay. The location of the house is absolutely perfect - just a minute walk to the beach, so I took my morning tea cup and enjoyed it by the sea. So we just LOVED our stay at Lis place. Highly recommend this place and Li as a host!
Really nice place to stay, would definitely book again

The place is decorated in basic "student", but is glorious filled with light. Location is top and the host wants all to go well, so is very present in communication. The parking was an added plus. Overall, I won't hesitate to go back.

Li is a fantastic host with amazing apartment. That house has everything what you can need, big beds, two balconies, three air-conditionings(!) - one in every room, well equipped kitchen and bathroom. Moreover, what was really important for us - free parking place in private parking opposite apartment. In addition, there were only 300 metres to the beach. Our staying was incredible and I highly recommend it!
This apartment is absolutely perfect for Tel Aviv! Close to everything - the beach, market, buses... everything!! The place was clean and air con in every room! Such a pleasure. Had the perfect time.
the location is outstanding. Very close to the beach and very close to famous carmel market.

We had a great stay. The location was perfect in the middle of the city 2 minutes walk to the beach and 2 minutes walk to the market (which is really important as grocery stores in Tel Aviv are super expensive and shopping in the market is much cheaper and more fun :). The hospitality was super - they let us have a later check out as there was no one checking in immediately after us and I even left my handbag there and they kept it safe and arranged for my friend to pick it up for me - they really took care of us :). Thank you ! :)

When we arrived in the apartment we were a little bit disappointed, as we expected a bigger and renovated apartment due to the pictures on Airbnb (even the furniture is partially different). The apartment is in need of renovation and reminds me on my studenthood. It was ok as we have been only a couple of guys. I would definitively not stay in the apartment with my girlfriend.

The biggest selling point of the apartment is it’s location, as the beach and local market is in walking distance! The communication with the host was also very good! Thanks for that.

This place is all about location. It’s was clean and dealing with the host was easy. It’s a short 2 block walk to the beach and the local playground is close enough to supervise your kids from your balcony.
Great location!

We realy enjoyed our stay in this apartment. The location is amazing. It's very close to the beach and the carmel market. The Rothschild-Boulevard is about 15 min walking distance. The Apartment is cozy and in a quite area. The host is realy nice. He helps you with everything.

Nice and friendly place.  Perfect for  going to the nearby Carmel Marcet and Shopping streets.  As well  the sea-side is walking distance 5 minutes.  Everybody around is friendly and helpful, the house is just in renovation and will become beautiful outside too.
Perfect location, great host! Recommended!
Great location. Close to everything. Has two balconies.

Really nice and charming place in the best area of Tel Aviv – on a calm street between the Carmel market and the beach. I recommend this apartment 100% to everyone. It's in one of those beautiful old building, but inside it's clean and recently renovated.  Nice balconies, good beds. Even though I did not meet Li personally, the communication was very easy. Even the cab back to the airport was organized.
El lugar esta bien ubicado, el apto esta limpio. El edificio es viejo y se escucha el ruido de los carros en la calle.

L'appart est très bien situé entre la plage (à deux rues) et le quartier du marché (Carmel, Allenby, Sheinkin, King George) à 5 minutes à pied où l'on trouve restos, magasins etc., et aussi plusieurs lignes de bus. J'ai adoré particulièrement les deux balcons d'où on peut observer le terrain de jeux/petit parc en face ou se mêlent des familles avec enfants et de beaux gosses qui font de l'exercice avec leur entraîneur ! La maison de deux étages (l'appart est au 2ème étage) dégage cette patine typiquement "telavivienne" - mais cela fait le charme de l'endroit. Le mobilier est fonctionnel, sans plus, l'endroit et propre. Je craignait le bruit de la rue (une seule voie en sens unique) qui passe juste devant les balcons, mais j'ai été agréablement surpris : la nuit, c'est assez calme, en journée et, il y a de la circulation, mais ça reste très supportable. J'y retournerait sans hésiter !
